Expanisve. but like everything in Dubai u have of to pay top dollar for it.that life nothing u can do about it.but it's worth the money, nice entertainment for the kids

Great Experience!. The dolphins are amazing so well trained and great to interact with. Such a brilliant experience to be up close with the dolphin. You get to dance/play and interact with the dolphins and get some great photos to go with it. (albeit a bit pricey but worth it!)Definitely recommend!
Best Training. Miracle. Water park in desert. Training to Dolphins out of our thinking. Even we can play with Dolphins

Good experience.... Nice helpfull staff, a good experience, its overpriced like everything else in Dubai, if you want to take a personel picture its 200 AED extras, 100 for the entrance and 100 for the picture.

"Dance with Dolphin". Early morning after breakfast headed to Dolphin bay, Playing with them make you feel you are in the real ocean king. All dolphin were well trained to make magic. The feel of touching them was out of this world, as it was my first ever Dolphin experience, but it won't be last as i will be there on my birthday soon, 26 DEC 2015.
Swimming with dolphins. Expectations were met. Swam in shallow water with the Dolphins and received a lovely framed photo of the experience.

Memory to last a lifetime. We chose to do the Dolphin Adventure which was in deep water. It was really incredible to interact with Booker the dolphin. The dolphins are so well trained and extremely friendly. I am so delighted we chose to do this activity as it really was a memory that will last a lifetime.

Atlantis the Palm Dolphin Adventure. The experience of a lifetime. Well worth the money. Very well organised and presented by knowledgeable staff who obviously love their job and the dolphins. Lots of interaction with no more than six in a group. Also free entry to water park included in price. Worth around £45.

Experience of a Life Time. This is a must for any dolphin lover - I normally do not like the idea of dolphins kept in captivity however the facilities are fantastic and well looked all 28 dolphins are very well looked after. The interaction wasn't full on and only have 10 minutes max actually with the dolphin - the rest of the time is watching others within your group. Very expensive - and would have liked the tour to include looking at all the facilities and what the actual intentions are other than a tourism spot!

AMAZING. Amazing experience - highlight of our trip. The Dolphin Encounter lasts over an hour from start to finish. The staff are excellent! We were given an introduction and safety briefing before heading into the water with the dolphins and spent around 30/40 minutes in the water. There is an onsite photographer taking photo's for you as you cannot take your camera/mobile with you - to purchase the photo's can be expensive but so worth it to remember your trip. I would highly recommend this experience to anyone visiting the hotel or Dubai. I wish I could do it all over again!!

Just a great expercience !!. Just do it - it is worth the money - great and friendly organization and an outstanding everlasting experience. Choose the warmer wetsuit instead of a lifejacket only since the water in the dolphin bay is cooled down.

Bring a 300mm zoom with you!. It is what it is, an encounter with dolphins. The kind of things you do for your kids once in life, I think, the kids enjoyed. Personally, I did not like, probably because I was the one who had to pay! too expensive!Also they spoil your money with photos and gifts: you tell yourself that after all you spent thousand of Dirhams for entry and you play their game by "buying your memories".Hopefully they allow you to bring a camera, though not allowed to even get close to the water: I was lucky enough to carry my 300mm zoom with me and made my own memories! (don't get mad if their photographers get in front of you to mess up your moments).
A must in Dubai. A must do experience in Dubai especially with kids. Well organized, super clean and amazing fun delivered in a professional way.
Do it.. It was a amazing. The people were nice and very informative. The dolphins were beautiful and fun. Fun thing to do.
Great.. Would like to try again. The facility was fantastic and the couches were great in giving us the instructions on how to interact with the dolphins.

A birthday to remember. Fantastic. They are utterly amazing creatures and the staff are amazing. Could not have been happier on my birthday! Our photos were amazing.. if a little pricey but hey it was a moment to remember forever. Jazmine was our gorgeous Dolphin!
Worth it. My son loved this experience and i don't think he has stopped talking about it. It was expensive but really worth it and they get you with the photos. Its very amazing experience.
Dolphins at the Atlantis. Played with the dolphins was great. needed more time. so much to do but always so little time to experience this creation.
great afternoon. Took a 4 and 7 year old they loved it. It was very well organised and great fun. we also leant lots. It got cold in the late afternoon.

Good experience with room for improvement. Booked the same day for a 9:30am scuba experience. When I showed up, I was the only one signed up. Check in process was pretty smooth. There is no information prior to showing up that tells you when you need to be there. You are fine to show up at 9:30am for a 9:30am session apparently. The photographer I had for my session was not very good at capturing photos. One thing they should be aware of is that if you scuba dive, you still want one of those cool photos above water with the dolphin. They need to upgrade their cameras and also get GoPro cameras down there. I would rather have a video clip than a semi-blurry photo. Overall it was almost worth it experience wise. The time with the dolphin was very scripted and not as free flowing as you would have hoped. Every single move the dolphin made was part of a routine. The direction given prior to going under was only fair. There is a good amount of information to know and they just pour it out like you have heard it 1000 times. Be better about your communication.

Wow!!! what an experiance. Excellent. Lots of time in the water with the Dolphins. Great experience. Better to take the earliest time so is not too hot and dolphins are not too tired.This experience was absolutely amazing. We hugely enjoyed the entire experience awesome swim with the dolphins to the all inclusive food and beverages. An amazing day! Would absolutely recommend to anyone..
Swimming with dolphins. We took the royal swim, the trainers was very professional and the dolphins where nice. Maybe a little expensive, but it's nice to have tried it.

once in a lifetime experience. i was apprehensive when i first decided to do this, however this is the best thing i could have ever done in my life. The dolphin I got to touch, play and swim with was so gentle and so cute. once in a lifetime experience love it!!

Simply magical. A "Big Birthday" treat for my best friend and her family. As animal lovers, we didn't know what to expect and we all came away enthralled by our encounter. The animals appear to be very well looked after and the trainers very knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend this.

Not cheap! but worth the experience. Not cheap, but then again nothing is cheap in Dubai. Dolphin Royal swim was awesome, wish it could've been longer. Well organised, staff were very entertaining and knowledgeable. Safety around the dolphins was there #1 priority for you and the dolphins sake. Photos taken during your swim are available afterwards in the gift shop. Photos are High quality but very expensive, I got about 20 or so photos on a USB for around $200au !

What a memory to give to the kids. Wonderful morning at Dolphin Bay!! First class and professional experience all the way. Visited with family of 4 (daughter 12 and son 10). From the check in to the presentation to the trainers, exceeded all expectations and the chance to swim with and hug a dolphin is something the kids won't soon forget. Photos are priceless.

Dolphin Bay Interaction. You get a lot of time with the friendly dolphins, best time is to go in the morning. I have done the dolphin scuba dive, royal swim and the shallow water interaction. You get the most wonderful trainers that brief you well and all the dolphins are very friendly and listen to the commands of their trainers. You have to pay separately for the pictures which is around 500 dhs to store them all in the USB. The rest the royal swim was 1200 dhs. The dolphin scuba dive 1500 dhs. The Shallow water interaction was for 800 dhs.

Not Cheap, but it's a nice experience. It's something we had done before in singapore. It's not too economical, but it was nice to see how well trained and friendly the dolphins are.Not worth while if children or anyone is scared to touch them! They're really cute and well trained though!

A unique experience. I went there 5 times and it always generates the same excitement every time.Dolphin Bay is very well organized. They provide a very thorough introduction about dolphins, ahow to behave with them in the lagoon, etc. (maybe sometimes a little bit too long?).You get to join a group of 6-8 people, and take turn for the different activities with dolphins.I have done the shallo water, as well as the deep water experiences. The only add-on to the deep water is, that you get to be pulled by a dolphin whilst holding on his/her fins. I didn't feel super comfrtable about it and much prefer the shallow water experience where dolphins are left in peace.A photographer is on the side of the pool constantly snapping pictures, so you can get to choose and buy some pictures afterwards if you want to.

Great Experience!. The experience with the Dolphins was amazing! The kids were so excited and its a must see for everyone visiting Dubai.However,visitors need to be cautioned that the payment for waterpark DOES not include visit to the Dolphin Bay and this has to be paid separately.It was quite disappointing for some to discover that there is separate payment for Dolphin Bay only too late ending up watching from the shores.
Very nice experience. My kids ages 15 14 and 10 had the best time there with the dolphins ..they swam and took pictures with them ..of course I recommend it
dophin. We went to the water park and met lennox. it was a great day and the dolphins seemed very happy. it was a lovely experience

Great. If you are staying at the atlantis there is a slight reduction in the price for this attraction. it is well worth doing. well organisaed and in small groups so you get a great opportunity to experience the dolphins. Very safe.
Nice experience..steep prices. Awesome day, well planned out, however, quite steep a price! Sad for the dolphins...kids would love it though!

An experience to remember. Booked a visit here for my sisters 22nd birthday and we had the worst experience trying to sort a date and time out. Expedia we're awful, I would advise not to book through these and there was a major language barrier we found. We only managed to sort it the day before we wanted to go thanks to our hotel concierge contacting them for us. When we arrived we were checked in, given meal tickets, food voucher and aquarium vouchers then pointed where to go. We started to walk then opted for a buggy which was a great idea! Once we were there we sat down with a little bleeper that went off when it was time to go in. Pre warning that your hair cant have any bobbles, clips or accessories in and no earrings or any other jewellery can be warn. We then were given our wetsuits and be prepared to be sucked in! There was then a little class explaining about dolphins, what to do and what not to do, then we were separated into groups. We chose the deep water one and we are so glad we did. We all got a dance, hug, kiss, swim and more with Bucker our dolphin. We were so surprised at how much time we actually got overall. I would recommend this to everyone, it made my holiday.
Wonderful Experience. Cant describe in words but the visit to dolphin bay is one of the most memorable day for our entire gang as that day was full of fun and laughs, one must try ......
a lot of interaction with dolphin. one of the best experiences i have ever done. trainers were amazing and the hotel was fantastic. amazing watermark too.

Hands down faultless interaction with some beautiful mammals. We arrived at dolphin bay having booked it through our hotel, to start off we were disappointed that our hotel didn't explain that if we chose deep water interaction we could swim with the dolphin but this was a hotel issue not a dolphin bay issue. We did shallow water and even this was a brilliant experience. The lady had recommenced to me afterwards that the royal swim would be the best one for us so next time we would do this. We was greeted by the staff at dolphin bay and the transition from changing into our wetsuits to the briefing before the dolphin interaction was very professional. We was in a small group and our dolphin was called Central. She was beautiful and attentive to everyone. She allowed us to hug her, kiss her, play ball and dance with her. The Dolphin trainers were absolutely professional and was able to answer any questions we had regarding the dolphins. I much preferred this interaction rather than watch animals do shows as I find this is unfair. You can really see that every trainer had a connection and passion with the dolphins. Afterwards we were given refreshments and could change and show etc. I would recommend taking your phone and leaving it with your towel by the beach so that you can get a few snaps as the only thing I would say about the dolphin bay is that they really bump you on the photographs. They are very expensive and don't offer enough options ie if you just want 4 or 6 they would want 75 dirham per photo. Or 500 dirham for the USB which works out to nearly £100 for a USB. I would have rather they charge more to swim with the dolphins that over charge on photography. Other than this the experience and professionalism of this attraction was brilliant.

Dolphin Bay - just beautiful. I don't always agree with animals being kept in captivity but this area is just beautiful. The dolphins clearly love the interaction with the guests and the staff love the dolphins !

Swim with the dolphins - A cool thing to do. Both my husband and I have experienced a swim with the dolphins together and it was a good bonding thing to do! It feels pretty cool to be with those special creatures although we thought it was a bit overpriced for what the experience offers altogether. I wouldn't put this at the top of the To do List.

Overpriced spectator. We went here to watch our nephew swim with dolphins. We were charged full park admission for the privilege of doing so which was shocking. The experience was limited to a dolphin swimming around you and you get your photo taken with it. very expensive and probably worth it but only once. Seems cruel to me.
Great fun and educational. Pricey but worth the experience. The trainer knows their dolphin and we felt that they truly looks after their dolphins. It was very educational for the kids.

Dolphin experience. Dolphin bay was a great experience and interacting with the Dolphins was really theraputic.To make the day exciting there is also access to the aqua park which is really great fun.Just make sure you take plenty of money.Its not the cheapest day out for a family

Amazing Experience!. Amazing Family Experience..We loved it! We did the dolpin encounter as our kids are to small to do the adventure. It is expensive but worth it. Our kids were so excited and loved the whole experience (we as well). Very well organised. Just little tip: arrive with swimclothes already on as there is not a real private change room, just a locker room. If you want you can get an observerpass for a friend who can take pictures from the beach or you can buy photos from their photographer. Nice Photos and memory but expensive (we paid 500dhs for pictures on a USB) .
excellent great day out for family. was easy going nice friendly staff awesome place good place to take family, and was a very enjoyable day out

Dolphins are fun. I was so scared to swim with the dolphins but it was something I always wanted to do.
It was the most amazing experience ever.
But it felt like I had a basic session as so many people I know who have done this here and around the world had different experiences. But it is a must do I say.
Dolphins are my favorite. This is one of my most memorable experiences of my life. My dolphin was amazing, the trainers were fantastic. This would be a great activity to do with kids.

Royal Swim Is Well Worth It. Although this excursion does cost a bit it is definitely worth it! My boyfriend said this was definitely one of the hi lights of the trip and I couldn't agree more. The staff are extremely professional and the bond between them and the Dolphins is so lovely. Our trainer, Carlos made the experience very fun and informative. The photos were very good quality and we purchased the memory stick and 10 prints package. Definitely recommended!

The Royal Swim. Our 18 year wanted to get the chance to swim with dolphins and therefore booked into the Royal Swim option. You were in groups of 6 and had some time with the dolphins, but over a 70 or 80 minute session you were in the water less than 30 minutes

Amazing experience!. The high lite of our trip as far as our children are concerned. This is an expensive excursion but is an incredible experience.The staff were very professional, friendly and informative. They were very aware at all times of the animals welfare and gave very precise instructions on how to behave etc. I feel it is a once in a lifetime experience that our children will never forget and worth the hefty price tag.

Brilliant!. Took my wife as a treat and we both loved it!Although expensive the experience is amazing. My wife had swum with Dolphins in America but said she much preferred Dolphin Bay.We did the deep water encounter and the setting is staggering.The photos were expensive (500AED) but worth it, a great experience

The interaction was great but the photos were crap.. Had a great interaction with the dolphin. Went swimming, patterd her she pulled me on her fin. It was great. We were looking forward to the photos that were going to be our reminder forever and when we went to pick them up thery were aweful. Made me look like a big fat balloon while iam normal.The photographer was bad and I mean bad. Most people looked weired on them. I complained but it wasn't solved.

wanna dream come true? Swim and love with the friendly dolphins. ive been here only once its expensive but its worth it.. u get to swim with dolphins hu are so friendly that u actually start loving them and there is a lot of other things to see also
A great experience with Dolphins. Beter than any other dolphin attraction we ever did. Only expensive if you have to to it with the complete family. Look for special price offers.

Surreal experience. Such a surreal experience to be able to interact with such smart creatures and see their playful nature. A once in a lifetime opportunity and one not to be missed off your bucket list. Highly recommended.

Absolutely amazing and humbling*. To have the privilege of being close to such amazingly powerful animals is simply awesome. The trainers are so knowledgeable and really help make the experience the best. We were paired with Cathy who was an amazing dolphin so beautiful and powerful. Being towed through the water by two Dolphins really makes you appreciate the power and grace of the animal. Overall it is a definite bucket list experience. *as is said in the many other posts the cost of the professional photos are extortionate. We choose to purchase the USB key for ~£80 so we can print them at home.
Wonderful experience. Wonderful experience with staff who really love the Dolphins. We did the swimming 'Advernture' and the interaction with the Dolphins was unforgettable.

Beautiful family experience. We went here to do what we saw in the photos . The attraction is part of the Atlantis Palm resort water park . It's quite expensive and to start with you get a welcome lecture , jump into a wet suit , and I recommend one part of the family doesn't get into the water , but pays to watch from the man made beach . That's what I did and I got many amazing photos . Overall a wonderful experience

Beautiful family experience. We went here to do what we saw in the photos . The attraction is part of the Atlantis Palm resort water park . It's quite expensive and to start with you get a welcome lecture , jump into a wet suit , and I recommend one part of the family doesn't get into the water , but pays to watch from the man made beach . That's what I did and I got many amazing photos . Overall a wonderful experience

Amazing dolphin adventure experience. I went recently to Dubai and one of my dreams was to swim with dolphins.There are 3 options available for dolphins..first is the shallow water where you can just get in contact with the dolphin,then you have the adventure in the deep water( you must be a good swimmer) where you can actually swim with the dolphin and for the third option you need a diving certificate. If you know how to swim would definitely recommend the dolphin adventure.Is so much fun and is worth doing it once in your life! Its around £190 for an hour and a half.

A Memorable Dream Forever����. Not something you do every day. Up close with the Dolphins. Having your photo taken and everyone makes your visit special. Don't miss out. Home now and this visit will stay with me forever. Have fun.
Beautiful!. Probably the most cutest and amazing experience you will ever have. Make sure they give your pictures at the end though!
Good Experiennce. It's expensive but its also great as a one off treat for all the family. it is truly AMAZING. you should defenetly try

Great for families. I took my Godsons here and they loved it to be able to see the dolphins so close up and touch them. It is really expensive. It is very kids focused but good for them to learn more about dolphins. Just hope the dolphins are well looked after and happy as you know it is not natural for animals to be contained.
Do it!. Great fun - visited together with my parents (around 60). We all enjoyed it. And by the looks of it, the dolphins did too :)
The must visit and swim with dolphin.. One of the Must visit tourism in Middle East and play with the Dolphins. The location is at Palm Jumeirah area, at the Atlantis Hotel.

Pleased we did it. A fabulous experience and encounter with dolphins. The staff are very knowledgable and obviously care for the dolphins very much.
The catch is the photographs - it works out very expensive if you ave a large group and buy photos after.
the name says it. what a experience,, the money is lot but if you have deep pockets dont even think of missing it.. else do it first in your trip
Dolphin Bay the Atlantis Hotel. Excellent once in a lifetime experience. A lil pricey I paid 130 pounds approximately, but have no regrets.
Great. Its was a first time experience and i loved it, different tricks with such a wonderful creature. Great experience.
once worth it to do it. Its lovely. Did, happy. Kids enjoy more. Is just one of the activities, what else can you say.. its pricey too, but if you never done it before, its worth doing at least once!

Great Experience!. I took part in the Dolphin Encounter at the Dolphin Bay while my partner watched from the beach area where he was welcome to take pictures. The staff are all friendly and knowledgeable, it's very informative. Refreshments provided afterwards and a chance to purchase the professional pictures, price to be expected. The dolphins are gorgeous! A lovely setting for a great experience. Definitely worth it :)

“Brilliant but expensive day”. It's expensive but great as a one off treat for all the family. The staff are very knowledgeable and helpful. The interaction with the Dolphins is fabulous. A tip buy the memory stick with all your photos on its better value than having the photos printed there and overall much cheaper. It's worth the money when you also have a full day in the Atlantis water park.

FANTASTIC. If you get the chance to do this please do, it is truly AMAZING, you get a talk about the dolphins first then 20 minutes actually swimming with them. you are split into groups of 6 and each group has a trainer and a dolphin, you get to hug, kiss and stroke them they are truly spectacular animals and being so close to them makes you realise this even more.

Expensive but worth it.. My daughter loved this experience and I don't think she has stopped talking about it. Yes it was expensive and they get you with the photos...but l think it's a once in a life time thing.

Attraction at Dubai. a good place to visit while visiting Dubai, The show is great and well managed, you can enjoy watching it, the various activities shown by Dolphins are very attractive and you will enjoy a lot.
Lovely!. What a wonderful and well run place. The staff are friendly and well informed and obviously care about the dolphins with a passion. Our kids loved the experience.

Amazing dolphin experience. Well well well ;) finally have managed to fulfil the dream to swim with this beautiful animals. I was actively sailing when I was younger and I have been lucky to see them before, they were following my sailing boat and jumping out of the water to show off, but I never had the chance to embrace one, to cuddle them and see how really lovely they are. If you have the chance to close to Atlantis hotel at The Palm, do waste an hour or more of you time because you'll truly enjoy it.
not value for money. it is a beautiful experience , but bit costly .i will say not the value for money. you can visit dolphinarium and get your photo clicked with the dolphin in 1/10th the price

Brilliant but expensive day. It's expensive but great as a one off treat for all the family. The staff are very knowledgeable and helpful. The interaction with the Dolphins is fabulous. A tip buy the memory stick with all your photos on its better value than having the photos printed there and overall much cheaper. It's worth the money when you also have a full day in the Atlantis water park.

great experience. We booked the experience where you get to swim with the dolphins and had a really great time. The dolphin dances around you, drags you or you get to hug him. If you love dolphins you have to do this.Beforehand you get some general information about them. Afterwards you get some refreshments and can purchase pictures they have taken during the experience.
Amazing!. Jenna and the staff were amazing! Thank you for making our experience one to never forget! Would definitely recommend!

Amazing experience!. Couldn't recommend this enough. I was wary at the prices they charged per person, But it was totally worth it and a once in a lifetime opportunity to do.My girlfriend was happy for the rest of the holiday after doing this...

Amazing. Amazing experience. Throughly enjoyed our time spent with S2 and his trainer. All staff were helpful and very pleasant. Dolphin experience was in a small group which enabled all to interact with dolphin.

Just Do It!. Yes, it's not cheap, but you'll have a unique experience and many happy memories.A professionally run attraction - you'll gain an insightful knowledge of these wonderful mammals. I was pleasantly surprised at just how much time we spent in the water with them and close proximity. Been there, seen it, done it, got the T-shirt and will repeat it again.

Meeting amazing animals. We booked for the dolphin encounter at Dolphin bay! Although it is expensive it was an amazing experience.The entire setup is very well organized and the trainers knowledgable! It was awesome meeting S2 and his trainer. He felt so soft and is truly a gentle animal. They are well looked after and the safety of the dolphins as well as visitors is a priority.I would love to go and meet them again!

Great Experience.... Ok, it's quite expensive and then the charge for photos is extortionate - £100 for 10 pics! but it's a very good close-up, hands-on expereince with dolphins - especially for kids. Small groups with 1 trainer and 1 dolphin - my partner's daughter loved it.

Top experience. What an amazing experience getting up close with these amazing animals. Swimming and playing with several dolphins was a truly remarkable experience for me. well worth every penny for the royal swim experience

Kissing the Dolphins. one of the best Experience we have ever had !! if you love this cute creature then go and have the chance to interact with your lovely dolphins , the experience include an individual interact with the Dolphins , each one has a kiss and a hug from Dolphins !! also the hall encounter was amazing . we enjoyed the Show very Much . very recommended ..

Good experience. Our 13 year old son participated in the Royal swim. He really enjoyed the experience and the look on his face said it all. It is very expensive and the price of the photos is a joke. We bought the memory stick which seemed the best value for money and printed off the photos at home.

One of the most amazing experiences. Admittedly, there was a wait even though we had reservations, but it was totally worth it. Swimming with dolphins is just an amazing experience. We booked one of the more exclusive packages, 6 people with one dolphin: touching swimming, pushing, playing in the water - was all part of it. The keepers are very professional and try to keep the animals in a nature-like habitat. It seemed like the dolphins were happy and the place was not overcrowded with people so they had their off time, as well.There are a number of basins with different groups of people who have booked different packages, and they also have a number of dolphins. They all had names and different personalities... I recommend to anyone!!
Amazing. Worth the opportunity to get close with these creatures. A bit pricey but kids and adults enjoyed the experience.
Great day. Hi booked for me and my son had reservations but needn't it was great we both enjoyed it and had a fantastic day with the Dolphins and the free passes into Atlantis Aqua park .

Dolphin Encounter. This is great we have done this both times whilst we stayed at the Atlantis, excellent for young kids who are a little unsure.They take excellent photos for you and are a must buy even if a little expensive.

Great Experience and Memories. Expensive and very sceptical beforehand but what a great experience. Really well done and very knowledgable and passionate team members. Excellent experience and some great memories. If you can, do not miss out on this.

Dolphin Bay. At the Dolphin bay, depending on the kind of experience one wants as well as the money one is willing to spent, you have enjoy varied experiences from just being a watcher, to clicking some pictures to actually swimming with them,

Best dolphin experience ever.. I did this as part of a group of 7, the oldest being 58, the youngest, 4. The speech before the encounter was really informative but lighthearted and funny. The encounter itself was just amazing. It was only 30 minutes, but every minute was packed with photos, dancing, interaction of all sorts with the dolphin. It cost just under £1000 for the 7 of us, but it was well worth every penny. The photos afterward were great too and cost about £100 for a USB with all of them. My advice: do it if you can. Everyday. The water park afterwards (free entry) was just amazing too. Fantastic slides for all ages and the lazy river was the best I've been on. Only disadvantages were: poor shower facilities that were jam packed and you need to smuggle flip flops in your bikini as if you attempt to walk anywhere that's not wet, you risk 1st degree burns.

A heart-warming experience!. This is an experience you won't want to miss out on when you're in Dubai. The entire process starting from the informational video, to the view of the bay and the dolphins teasing you with their flips as we wait, through to the group and one-to-ones with them, those beautiful creatures took my breath away, and my smile never faded. It was just pure, heart warming, delerious fun! The instructors are very knowledgeable and as long as you follow their instructions, you're all set ! Where else would I have had the chance to hug and kiss a dolphin :-)

A must for everyone. With staff that really do look after the welfare of these magnificent creatures this was an amazing experience for me and the family With lots of packages to suit everyone this is a must you will kick yourself if you don't Ricardo with Lexi you guys were great

swimming with dolphins. A fantastic experience . The cost is around £200 for an hour and a quarter of which the first 45 minutes are getting changed into a wetsuit and then having a talk on the local sea life around the Palm. The adventure includes being individually pulled along by two dolphins as well as getting a kiss and a cuddle with one of them.

Experience of a lifetime. A must do if you love dolphins! Being able to interact with a beautiful animal, trained perfectly and in a controlled environment - why not do it and get hugs and kisses from Dolphins! Staff are very helpful and try to give the best to all!Observers are also allowed on the beach

Must see. Absolutely amazing facility. The whole set up is wonderful. Clean and large areas for the animals always makes me feel better about them not being in their natural habitat.The opportunity to get one to one with such creatures is a privilege and yes the fee can be deemed expensive.I would rather pay more, and the animals have a better quality of life instead of cheap tickets with awful facilitiesA must when in Dubai for any age
Great experience, crazy prices. My kds had the time of their lives here. Absolutely superb. Mind you, as with everything at the Atlantis, the prices are extortionate!
Great. Great experience, the trainers was so good and helpful. Would recommend it. Get there early before it gets hot and wear the full swim suit as the water sometimes is cold

Great Experience. I had been given this experience as a present and had a great time. It was very well organised and the staff were extremely knowledgeable and clearly cared passionately about the dolphins that they were training and looking after. I felt I had a good amount of time with the dolphin and our group was a small one. I can appreciate that this is not a cheap experience but I enjoyed every minute of it.

A must do. What a brilliant place, me and my son loved the dolphins. We took the deep water option and were placed in a small group of 6 people with 2 trainers. There is a talk beforehand after you put on the supplied wetsuit , really informative and you soon realise how much the dolphins are cared for.It's expensive but after you've done it you will realise its worth every penny! Also you get Free access to the water park. The whole trip is brilliantly organised and very professionally done. Staff are very helpful so thanks to all, especially 'tulagi' our dolphin.
Very impressive. This place was excellent. Great experience with the Dolphins who all seemed healthy and well kept. This is something that will live with us for years. Definitely worth the money
Eexcellent place to feel you are ocean..... Eexcellent place to feel you are ocean playing with dolphin.safe place to learning how to handle dolphin....There are many events and discounts...
Worth Worth visit in Dubai.. Good experience with kid. Book in advance before you visit the property. Kids will love this. Ready for walk.
fabulous place. A place where one can enjoy with dolphin and even play with it, swim with etc can enjoy with this fabulous creature in the water park

Probably worth visiting once. I thiught this place was bit expensive to what we get. The people managing the dolphins have the required experience, and the experience was good. My children liked the visit

Superb experience. My daughter and husband experienced the Dolphin interaction in shallow water. Myself and son paid to watch and took photographs from the beach. Well organised, staff knowledgeable and friendly. The pictures we took speak a thousand words !
dolphin bay. kids enjoy a lot.Adult wont enjoy it especially considering the cost and time to visit it. kids just have fun seeing dolphin dancing in unison.

Amazing bucket list experience. Don't miss this experience. Small groups of around 8 people are taking into shallow water to interact with their own dolphin. The staff are very knowledgeable and helpful, time with the dolphin is reasonable and it is difficult to avoid buying the whole photo package when the experience is over. Well organised, an information packed presentation is provided beforehand. You can't take cameras to the pool area, towels and wet suits are provided, as well as lockers and shower facilities. Discount on price is offered by the hotel if you book at least two weeks in advance (go to their website) but this bucket list experience is worth every penny.

Great experience. The team at Dolphin Bay are very knowledgeable and obviously really love their job ! The experience was fabulous and I would recommend it to any visitors to Dubai. The only down-side was the fact that you have to pay extra for locker facilities when you go to the waterpark after your Dolphin experience - I felt this was unreasonable after the not insignificant cost of the Dolphin Bay Experience
dolphins. good place to visit in dubai.. peaceful place .. u can swim with dolphinss ... though it is an expensive place.. but worth visitn

Amazing place... Great Places, More thrill and mind relaxing place to watch Dolphins play. If you are good in Swim you can enjoy more than a kids stage. Play around kiss around with Dolphins. Worth visit..

Nice experience but. I have been in the dolphin bay in Dubai with my wife and my one year old son the experience was very nice and interesting but the price is over 900 for one ticket and for children same price ,for photos as well 10 for 600 Dirham

Dolphin encounter @Atlantis. The dolphin encounter at Atlantis was one of the most memorable experiences I had in dubai! Despite a rather dull presentation from one of the trainers we had an amazing time in the water constantly entertained by a different trainer by the name of Yasin and our dolphin Hilma! A great experience for animal lovers..

Fun, Fun, Fun!!. Took the kids to the Dolphin Bay, which is located at The Atlantis the Palm Hotel. This is one of the many fun things to do here. Children will especially enjoy seeing all the acrobatics these Dolphins are capable of.

Overrated experience !. The introduction time and wait is too long. They take you into the water in a group therefore the interaction time with the dolphin is not very long.The dolphins are cute and well-trained but the experience is not as exciting as it could be.Overall very overrated experience ! If one really wants to it can be done once but that's about it !

Fabulous again!. My second time here and it is still just as fabulous as the first! Staff make the experience so relaxing and enjoyable. We went on the day of a sand storm (typical) and were worried that the photos would suffer because of this - fear not, the poor woman behind the counter actually went in and edited every single photo (there were hundreds as there was 3 of us) so that it looked brighter, a sunny day and better quality!!
awesome experience. it was awesome to interact with these beautiful and friendly animals. want to go here again and again

Amazing experience. Beautiful experience.My girls did the swimming with the dolphins which they loved so much- they wanted to have more time but of course there are limited toime in the water.definitely worth it though.

Dolphin experience. My wife and son went in with the Dolphins whilst Dad did the cinematics from the beach. There is also an official photographer present. There are professional Zoologists/handlers and they gave us a classroom briefing first of "Do's" and "Don'ts" which was excellent. Please take all bracelets and jewellery off if you intend to go in with the beautiful Dolphins

Disappointing. My life long dream to swim with dolphins. My daughter and I did the deep water adventure (£164 each). Very commercialized. There was six to a group but there were about five different groups in the area going on at the same time. It didn't really feel very special. The short belly ride back to shore by the dolphin was the best bit but did feel let down by the rest. I'm glad we did it because I would have regretted it if we didn't but it was quite a let down if I'm honest. Expected better from the Atlantis.

Great experience. This was a gift for my niece and we loved it. These dolphins are well trained and you can tell they do enjoy contact with people. It was very fun and staff is really friendly and international.

Such a great experience. We did the top experience you could do, we were in a group of 6 which isn't too many. It's fine. Dolphins were happy and so were the staff. It's also the biggest dolphin enclosure I have ever seen, it really is lovely and we'll worth the money

Do it once, but it's expensive.. We were staying at the Atlantis, so this was just next door. A discount is offered to Atlantis guests, but even so this still cost £1,000 for a family of 5 to get in with the dolphins and with some photographs paid for at the end. Not cheap, but it's something you'll want to do once.

Stop pushing the photo ops and I'd then enjoy it more!. Amazing experience and the staff working with the dolphins were first rate. However for me I wanted to enjoy the dolphin experience not pose time and time again for photos. I was part of a group of 5 and it felt like a production line. It would have been so much better if we could have slowed down and been allowed to really enjoy each moment.

Professional, too structured, and bottom line ... a business. I always dreamed about swimming with dolphins. After experiencing them in the wild in the past, I never really swam with them ... until we went to Dolphin Bay.My hubby and I went together. While we fell in love with the dolphins, it was far too structured/limited for our liking. We were in a group with four others, so six people total, and it was Go Go Go all the time. There was no real time to interact with the dolphins (free play time) besides the structured interaction. Of course it was an amazing experience but it also made us wonder how much "free time" the dolphins actually get. After all they are animals and not just inventory.You are not allowed to take cameras or anything else besides your own body (no jewelry etc) into the water with you. There is a visitor ticket for friends or family to come inside the venue with you so they can watch and take pictures from the beach. There are loungers for individuals with visitor tickets.Professional pictures will be taken by photographers on site but their pictures are pretty pricey. We ended up buying the digital package, which included all wanted pictures within our group, and split the cost with a girl that we became friends with in the group. That way it was affordable.On a different note we have to say that everyone was very nice and friendly. Having access to the water park as part of the package was wonderful.We had a great day overall but would probably not do the dolphin encounter again. Next time we want to play with dolphins we will go on a Musandam trip and hopefully get lucky and be able to play with dolphins in the wild.
Dolphins and Humans. Dolphins and HumansWe group of seven all of us swim but I left early for taking photos of my family Every one left with happiness marked in his face the adults before the kids

family fun. i'd always been fascinated with dolphins. the first experience of touching one was in the Shed Aquarium in Baltimore in 1991. but when i got married and had kids, i always thought that this would be a great experience to them too. living in dubai made it easy access. i have two daughters, 7 and 14, and for them, it was an unforgettable experience. the caretakers of the dolphins as well as the greeting staff were amazing in their friendliness. they do this day in day out, many times a day and you never cease to see the smiles on their faces and the attention to detail in everything they do. the venue is very well maintained and all the way to the end, the photographers take excellent photos for memories. a bit too pricy, but it's not something you do every day i suppose.

Fabulous. I had a one to one encounter with Amy the dolphin ... I was instructed to kneel down & Amy the dolphin would kiss me . Unfortunately due to ligament damage I couldn't kneel . However the staff were absolutely great & helped me have a truly memorable time & Amy reached out her flippers which I held while she danced for me . She also sang to me .... It was an experience I will treasure for ever !
Nice place, an experience, but over priced. I Did the royal swim and thought it was way over priced. Even the interaction withe the dolphins was quite minimal and quick.

Amazing. One of the most beautiful experiences of my life. We booked Royal Swim. We had 1 dolphin for 4 persons at all time, and for some games we had 2 dolphins. They pulled and pushed us, we were allowed to hug and kiss them.

Engaging staff and friendly dolphins. Truly memorable experience and friendly staff. When you learn how well they treat the dolphins and work with the animals with love and care, you stop worrying so much about the fact that you're essentially getting entertainment from enslaved dolphins.

Wild dolphins or tame you decide. If you want close up and personal with the do,phons, thus gets my vote! I touched the Dolphins I couldn't swi,pm with them, but you can, there's a great show as well, it's not cheep, but wonderful,

Amazing Day. Amazing day that is everythingI had hoped and more. Definitely worth the money. Very personal interaction with the staff and the Dolphins. The service is first class and the Dolphins are breathtaking. Simon, the Manager, runs an efficient operation with attention to every detail. Further, he is a gracious gentlemen who obviously cares a great deal about the experience he and his outstanding staff are providing. Simply stellar in every way.JWilson, USA

Fantastic. This is an amazing experience we did the deep water swim with the Dolphins in a group of only 4 we had a lot of fun and interaction with Lexi our Dolphin you will never get this close to such a beautiful creature. The experience was enhanced by the knowledge and expertise of our guides who answered questions and helped us get the best from our time in the water with Lexi you get half hour with your dolphin but as part of package you get free entry into the Atlantis water park which is great fun.

Wow. Despite the price tag on this attraction it is definitely worth it. We did the deep water experience and spent a good 3/4 hour with the Dolphins with information given beforehand. Includes hire of wetsuits and vests. Experience was unforgettable and you had plenty of 1:1 time with the dolphin. Activity ranged from hugging, dancing and having a belly ride on the dolphin. Photos which are taken by their photographers were well captured and priced ok. 2 photos in a leather cover cost us 150dhm.

Just for fun. Had a nice day out at The Atlantis Resort and water features. I liked the food selection which was more than the usual Burger and fries staff.It is easy to spend the entire day out in the resort and having fun with the Dolphins
Great to meet Saul to dolphin.. Quite expensive but we all really enjoyed it even my 3 year old son and they made it fun for him whilst keeping him and the dolphin safe.
Great experience. Fantastic service and experience. Highly recommended. My little one had a fantastic time meeting these amazing creatures

Swim and encounter with doplhins. We visited this attaction with kids, they let you to swim and play with dophins. You in group of 5-6 people in the pool and trainer is doing various actions and involve you one by one. It is one of very nice attraction. At the end you could have pictures printed or on USB stick. If you pay the ticket for this attraction you will have entrance to waterpark included. We visited this attraction twice. It was great.

Totally awesome. We booked the royal package, and the extra money is well worth it. You get plenty of interaction time with the dolphin and the trainer knows their dolphin intimately. Heaps of great photo opportunities, although the 500dhs to buy the flash drive with all of them on seems a bit too expensive (we did it anyway). All in all a really great way to spend the day since it also includes entry into the waterpark. Highly recommended!!

one of the lifetime experience!. we had the dolphin encounter, it was AMAZING! our twin girls of 6 loved it! our Dolphin was Tina, and the instructor was so nice and educational! we learnt a lot! my husband laughed so much when he hugged the dolphin (usually he doesn't laugh)! we kissed, hugged, played and touched Tina, it was just one in the lifetime experience and simply unforgettable!one of my daughter didn't want to leave, and she was really sad cause she said we will never see Tina again. i guess they really bonded with Tina, both of them said it was their best day ever! well, it was also my best day! we paid AED660 for all the pictures in USB, and 10 printed photos, it's expensive(so are all the other places in Dubai) but well, it's just so amazing that it's worthed. totally recommended! emotional experience!

Swim with the Dolphins while at Dolphin Bay - Wonderful Experience. A very well organised tour. Had a great time with the family. You start with a talk about the dolphins - the actual shallow water experience is 30 mins where you are formed into groups and each group gets a 1:1 interaction time with the dolphins. Our group interacted with the dolphin name "Lisa" who was unarguably the cutest dolphin ever. The whole experience is wonderful and a must do while you are in Dubai.

Amazing, Memorable Experience. I visited Dolphin Bay at Atlantis for my birthday, was an amazing, memorable experience. You're treated to an informative video and guide tutorial about the dolphins at Atlantis, their history, likes and dislikes etc. The group is then ushered to a changing area and provided the right clothing to wear, once ready everyone is put in to teams, I believe there were 5 teams and 5 dolphins. Each team has about 6 people. You are supervised by well trained guides who allow you to stroke and play with the dolphins whilst a photographer assigned to each group is constantly taking photos for you to keep as lasting memories. Such a great experience, you have to do it at least once in your life and Atlantis made it a great experience. If you have time, try and get a morning slot and then spend the rest of the day at Atlantis' Water Park.
oasis in dubai. wow!! one of the magical things is the dolphin bay! u get a chance to see all dolphins in the deserty dubai!! loved it

Amazing experience. This was an amazing experience that I have always wanted to do, my partner arranged this for my 50th birthday treat, and was worth every penny, the staff at the dolphin bay are amazing I am a wheelchair user and they were very good with me helped me to get sorted in the changing rooms, helped me with a chair they have to get you on to the sand, also helped me in the water with my partner, the dolphins are so gental with you as if they know you can't be knocked, so well done dolphin bay, can I say the place is very very clean to.
A lovely kiss at dolphin Bay. Dolphin Bay is a wonderful experience. I never Imagine that Dolphin can be so friendly. They are so wonderful. I will surely be there gaian

Expensive but worth it.. My children and I did the deep water experience and whilst it comes with a hefty price tag, it is well worth it. The dolphins are gentle and highly trained and our interaction with them and with the trainers, from dancing, to 'kissing' and being pulled through the water was wonderful. In all the experience lasts about 90 minutes including a 40 minutes briefing and changing. More time in the pool would have been good.

Up close and personal.. Actually we went a bit earlier than September 2014 but I forgot to post a review. Sorry! We took two types of 'experience', I stayed with the kids and did the shallow water one where the kids get to meet a dolphin up close and ven get a fishy kiss (ok, I know it's a mammal but the breath is fishy), my wife took the deep water one and swam around the lagoon with a dolphin. Worth the money but book online or take the package some of the hotels (like Atlantis) offer.
unique experience. Expensive but a unique experience. All children under 12 years old must be accompanied by a paying adult!
Incredible birthday surprise. Fabulous up close and personal dolphin experience. Small group (our family of four plus one other) had our own dolphin to meet and interact with.
Dolphin Bay Atlantis. Amazing facility. I have visited this place 3 times and every time it is a different experience. Recommended for all ages

Atlantis outstanding to visit.. Atlantis is well worth the visit or stay.
The aquarium is something to see as the varieties are outstanding. The complex is huge and very well populated.

Fun for the whole family. My daughter loved the experience and she cherishes the photos she took with the dolphins.
Definitely worth trying.

Great entertainment for the family. Excellent place to take the family Children and grown ups enjoy it equally. The dolphins are so well trained and both they and the trainers seem to be having a great time performing.

Get up close .. We got to see the dolphins luckily but didn't go close up on this occasion, as we had our baby son with us. I'd strongly recommend anyone to try and have a one to one experience with the dolphins and get into the water.

Excellent experience. We had the pleasure of meeting one of the many dolphins at Dolphin Bay. It was a truly amazing, once in a life time experience that I will never forget. Experienced staff clearly care for these beautiful animals.

Amazing Experience. Fantastic visit - great facility - very knowledgeable staff and clearly a great understanding and love of their profession. Allow alot of time to get through the system - arrive earlier than your alloted time - felt the cost of photos after was rather excessive you should at least get a picture included in the package - considering the cost you pay.
Magical. Memorable experience that we and our children will never forget. To get up close with dolphins was a privilege.

The Atlantis dolphin bay. An experience of a life time. Worth every dhiram. Book online. Do not book at the airport. We booked at the airport because it was cheaper but had to pay more at the entrance because they said we had not paid the right price.

Dolphin adven. We had a great morning swimming with the Dolphins today tues 28 July What made this extra special was Diana she was amazing, so very thoughtful, kind and caring. She was very attentive and exceptional at her job as soon as we checked in she looked after me and my family, thank you Diana from my heart, without you I wouldn't have done the experience my husband would have.Dolphin adventure fantastic, the belly tide and twirl great for me and my girls ( aged 11 and 13) lots of other activities with the Dolphins as well we're all great, good value for money, very convenient from the hotel, excellent experience and worth the money. Thank you Diana for making it possible for me.I hope this is read by management and diana is acknowledged. Customer service is fantastic
sealion play. son went in the water with sealions which was great and he had lots of fun getting a kiss for the sealion

Great experience!. My husband and I went for a Royal swim and it was amazing! It lasts only for and hour, but it was worth every penny! The staff was great, the dolphins are beautiful creatures and it was magical to be able to swim with them. This is a must when visiting Dubai!

Snog a dolphin photoshoot. Fab experience for adults, even more exciting for my daughter (9)Note, you are outside in direct sun and heat for what seems like a long time. No sunglasses allowed. V warm !

Amazing experience. Amazing experience swimming with Hilmar . Towels, Wetsuits or vests supplied , tuition given before experience ,photos taken by resort photographer during experience although rather pricey but a nice keepsake. Observers can take photos so no obligation to buy professional photos. Use of water park at Atlantis palm included in price .
Well worth a visit. Well organised and not too many people to share your dolphin with.The room that you wait in before your dolphin experience was really hot!!Just wish it lasted longer! !!
Beautiful. Beautifully done and very professional. I loved the architecture and the space given to enjoy the place.

Dolphin Bay at the Palm Atlantis. Firstly, it is the sheer attraction to visit the grand Palm Atlantis will take you to the Palm Jumeirah part of the city. It is perhaps an unique experience to love, cuddle and swim with the dolphins. Please book beforehand to relieve this unforgettable experience.

Pricey but a must. Everything is surreal, Dolphins in an Artificial bay, people playing with them, but it works and quite an experience. Don't knock this until you have tried it, those Dolphins have something special. But expect to pay up, it's pricey like so much in Dubai and if you are family of Four, you will really feel the pinch.
Extraordinary. Amazing!. Amazing, out of this world experience. It's a once in your life must. Must do it if you can. Bit pricey, but worth it. Fab!
Unreal experience. Love love love 5 star experience! we had the royal swim. Well worth every penny. Photos quite expensive at the end but you can't not buy them as they are such good quality.

Excellent Experience. It was amazing to be able to get so close to the dolphins and actually have them pull and push you through the water and pose fo cheeky photos with you. The dolphin handlers were very professional and knowledgable. It was obvious they were passionate about their work and interaction with the dolphins which was also very pleasing

What an awesome experience. I only watched from the side when our kids went through the dolphin experience but even just looking at the wonderful scenery got me excited. The event starts with a very professional briefing done by trainers that really give you the feeling that they care about you as well as their dolphins. The experience is very much factory like without too much space for flexibility but so what....after throwing balls, dancing, kissing and touching those wonderful animals my kids were glooming and grateful - and that's what is all about, isn't it?

Amazing experiance. We did this as part of our honeymoon, we did this hoping it would be amazing and... it really was, we got pushed through the water whilst two dolphins where pushing your feet and another when you are holding their fin. It was mind blowing. We did it in a group booking, which was fine, you didn't feel like there was to many, I think there was about 10 of us. We go to stroke and kiss the dolphin. Then when it was all over, they showed us some awesome tricks. It is 100% worth the money. Just be aware you can not wear any jewelry, earrings, hair bands NOTHING! So any religious bracelets have to come off too, also my husband is a 17st rugby player and they couldn't pull him or push so if you are a big guy/person might be worth watching?!

Recommended!. If you love dolphins - you should definitely go for this one. The staff is very professional, and dolphins are incredible creatures. Please, however, note that you can't take videos during this attraction but you can take photos. You will be able to kiss and caress dolphins, and you will also enjoy riding them. It is an amazing experience!

Superb. Dolphin bay offers high quality superior service for dolphin interaction. They are so keen with details and will help you enjoy the visit to the max. The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly as well. You are provided special suits to enter the water and also given clear instructions about how to handle the dolphins.

Fantastic. Great centre kids and the adults loved the experience this is the second visit and this time we visited the new sea lion centre . I would say the dolphin experience was better but cannot fault the new centre it's a personal choice.
Wonderful way to see amazing animals. I liked the care and attention paid to the Dolphins and the environment they are looked after and cared for in - a great centre and a wonderful way to learn.

lovely place to spent some time. I loved the site and service. awesome views mainly the fact that you can spent some time at the little coffee shops while enjoying the relaxing views of the Bay.Totally recommend once in Dubai.

Little reaction from the dolphins. I really enjoyed this. It was very well organised. The hotel wanted £20 for my husband to stand on the beach and watch me. As he was already a hotel guest I protested about the charge and eventually it was dropped but I found this embarrassing. The hotel should reconsider this charge for guests. I was however disappointed - well in dolphins themselves really. They are beautiful and clearly intelligent and trainable but mine showed no pleasure from my interaction with her. She didn't even look directly at me when I softly tickled her belly which I was assured she'd feel. Playing with a happy dog or cat is so lovely because they respond with pleasure. Sadly I had no response from my beautiful dolphin.

The meeting of a lifetime. I was treated to meeting the dolphin "Tina" and wow what an experience. You get a quick briefing of what to do and not do but then its straight into the water to meet Tina. You get to stroke her and she even kisses you on the cheek. Then to finish off she dances with you. The whole experience was fab and the staff were great too.

Do it... Highly recommended. Some amazing photos. Really good value for money and interesting to spend time up close with these amazing creatures... All very well organised and we spent more time than expected with the dolphins... We then looked at the photos and it worked out easier to take all the photos on a usb stick snd then we can upload them or print them wt our leisure.... The photos are great quality and each group has a dolphin and photographer each which is a nice spread... Really enjoyed and went for someones birthday who loved the experience.

Dolphin Bay at Atlantis Resort. Great for family experience. Well organized and great location . adjacent to Atlantis waterpark. One hour family fun with 20 minutes information presentation. Very friendly staff!
Stunning. A child dream came true. Recommend everybody, children parents,...An unforgettable experience.Buy yhe CD, it is much better than the picture, because all the pictures are beautiful.

Excellent Experience. Dolphin Bay was great. It is very well organised with great staff both from start to finish. It is very educational and fun. There are several different packages depending on your budget. You also get access to the Atlantis Waterpark which is also an excellent way to spend the day.

Love it. Its been an amazing experience, one of a kind, and its worth every penny. All the staff was very nice and helpful, spoke multiple languages and very good English and tried to make everyone happy. You do get to touch the dolphin multiple times and have your own time with him for pics. Pics are expensive but look amazing so cannt really say no to them
Fabulous place. had a day here and my daughter swam with the dophins, it was simply amazing to watch. Excellent organisation - lifetime experience.

Birthday gift for my son and hubby. The staff was really good with my guys, and I watched a couple other groups and they were attentive with everyone. It was about half an hour in the water, they had to get their vest on and do a brief video before getting in with the dolphins. My son said it was the best part of the trip. I was scared but after watching them I would like to do it myself the next visit. The cost is high but I think was average for this sort of thing.

amazing experience - a must do. the kids and adults all had a wonderful experience. the staff is very knowledgeable and friendly as well. you are provided special suits to enter the water and also given clear instructions about how to handle the dolphins.
Well trained Dolphins. Its great pleasure to watch the dolphins show. They are trained well to do. Kids are enjoyed lot. We are planning to visit again. There is garden near to the dolphin show.

Perfect afternoon. Spent the afternoon with my husband and soon with the Dolphins.
The guides were very knowledgeable and friendly.
A once in a lifetime experience

Better than Discovery Cover. This was better interaction with the dolphins than Discovery cove. The place is so clean and well run - partner couldn't swim so did the standing option and this is ideal for kids and families.

Dolphins rule.. This is a great experience. Took my girlfriend. She could not stop smiling. enjoyed it as well. Definitely book in advance. You will get a time slot. Show up about an hour early as you will enter at the hotel and depending on how busy they are you might get lucky and get a golf cart ride or you may have to walk a good ways to get to the dolphin center. You will be required to were put on a wet suit. There are changing areas for this.
A lifetime experience. Its should be in the must visit list for every tourist coming to Dubai. You will get to touch and feel man's best friend of Sea here
A day with the friendly dolphins. Done the Dolphin Interaction twice and that was amazing. Had a chance to play with Lennox and Sol. Lovely and friendly staff make your experience more memorable.
Lifetime experience. Whosoever goes to Dubai, must visit Dolphin Bay. I'll fell in love with them when I touched them and have fun with them. Dolphins r really best Sea Frnds.. :)

Must do. Cannot recommend this place enoughIt seems costlyWould be nice if a photo was included But really glad we did this and paid for couple of photographs in a hard caseDolphins are so intelligent Staff were great
Wonderful. Great experience the setting was wonderful the swim even better a dream come true for meDislike nothing

School trip to Dolphin Bay. We were part of a school group - 6 classes, each visiting Dolphin Bay on seperate days (they can only have a maximum of 25 students at one time, in the water with the Dolphins). Considering such a large group, we were very lucky that everything went so smoothly, thanks to Cliff Poulton, Sales Manager who was extremely helpful and efficient during the organising stage of the trip and then, the knowledgeable and well organised staff on the day. Our students learnt a lot and had a wonderful experience being able to learn about dolphins while in the water with them! The cost is also cheaper being a school group. Would definitely recommend this trip to school groups. Huge thanks to the staff at Dolphin Bay.

Wonderful. I can't explain how good this experience is, the trainers are brilliant and more over love the dolphins!
We will remember this experience for the rest of our lives.

SWIM WITH 'SOL' THE DOLPHIN. This was our second swim with the dolphins at Atlantis, loved it both times, as my son was under 8 both visits we could only do the shallow swim, but next year we going to do the dolphin adventure

Experience of a Lifetime. We booked the dolphin encounter for our whole family (kids ages 8,13, 14). The whole family had an amazing time, even those of us who initially weren't that enthusiastic about going. It was fun and informative. I was glad that we booked the earliest time slot available (9am). The time worked perfectly because it was not busy yet and we had the whole rest of the day to enjoy the free admission to the Aquaventure Waterpark. One thing to consider while preparing to go is that you cannot go into the water with loose items such as glasses, sunglasses, hats, or any hair bands, clips, etc. The only minor inconvenience I experienced is that I had to take out my pony tail so my hair looked disheveled for the pictures they take during the session. Obviously the dolphin's safety is more important than my hair though.

Dolphin Adventure. After much deliberation as to where to to book Dolphin Encounter or Dolphin Adventure, me and my boyfriend went ahead with Dolphin Adventure. This was definitely the right decision! Although being around £30 more, it seemed to be well worth the money. The encounter experience allowed people to play with the dolphins in shallow water and in larger groups. However the adventure programme was a lot more interactive, in smaller groups and in larger water. Only downside was that on the Atlantis website stated that Dolphin adventure would only be maximum 6 people per group. However ours had 7.It was a once in a lifetime opportunity which was extremely fun. You are unable to take pictures when in the water but there is a photographer. At the end we purchase 3 pictures which worked out around £30, so quite expensive but we wanted to have a memory of our experience.
Enchanting. Took my granddaughter to swim with the dolphins and it was great fun. A magical experience which we would happily do again.

Four year old loved it. really nice and clean. Wet suits provided. It was not just a quick in and out it was a really interactive experience photos at the end quite pricy but not something you do everyday.

Swimming with dolphins. This was the best part of our holiday. We booked the Dolphin Encounter. The whole experience was amazing, it was well organised and we were made to feel special. My 4 children (4,7,9 & 21!) had smiles on their faces for hours afterwards!

Lovely experience. We had the shallow water experience at Dolphin bay in April 2015. It is very well organised, staff friendly and informative. Good variety of wet suits and lots of huge towels that you are allowed to take into Aquaventure waterpark after your dolphin encounter so don't worry about bringing your own towels.You have a locker to use during your experience but not afterwards. The briefing was fun and educational. Once at the pool, you get time to quickly stroke your dolphin a few times, as she swam past, pose for a kiss photo and either dance with her or throw a hoop or ball. I felt it was a bit quick and didn't have as much one on one with the dolphin as I had hoped for, that is what lost 1 star in this review. I guess my expectations were, perhaps, a little high.In conclusion though, it was a great experience, I have ticked it off my bucket list and would probably do it again but I will try the deep water experience next time for variety
Very good. Very good and in attractive surroundings, if possible do the deep water excursion as I felt you had more contact with dolphins
Amazing dolphins. Amazing adventure, little bit scary being this close to the Dolphins. Well worth it though. I recommend it.

Royal Swim. Did the experience here for our honeymoon, its a wonderful experience, you do need to swim and tread water for a while, the dolphins do get very close, well in fact you hug them and hold them.It is impossible to get your own photos really but there are guides taking photos and you can buy them afterwards, we did although I dont normally, but it was worth it.
Dolphin Bay. Chance of a lifetime, bit expensive but that makes it a great gift for a loved one. They also have an option for people who don't want to get wet

An exceptional experience. We feel this was v nice experience for our child (12y), even though there were 6 other adult people, although could have taken more time. Suggest to purchase professional photos. Strongly recommend advanced purchase expecially at peak season!

Live with dolphins. This is part of Atlantis but with a separate entrance ticket. It is good for kids to have a first hand feel of dolphins, swim with them, have photo sessions etc. all charged separately. Quiet expensive. Even the observers not participating in it will have to buy tickets to be with them in case you intend to take pics.

Wow!. I am from Africa and dolphins are in our surf daily for us to enjoy. We have taken the kids to U-Shaka a few time for the dolphin and seal shows but i really was blown away when i had a fully grown dolphin literally in my arms and giving me a hug!!!The kids went off sides and my wife must have cried for most of the interaction. Its something every single human should be able to experience! Please don't go to this venue and not experience the dolphin interaction.

Superior dolphin interaction!. Dolphin bay offers high quality superior service for dolphin interaction. They are so keen with details and will help you enjoy the visit to the max! May be that's why they won't let you in with your own camera grrrrr! however, you can get an extremely high quality photo after your session so enjoy you visit :) Note: Dubai dolphinarium offer same interaction but in a small indoor pool with limited services, both have different tastes and i enjoyed both experiences :) eventually, it is the dolphin interaction that counts the most!

Dolphin encounter at Atlantis. My daughter really enjoyed it, I thought she could have possibly had more interaction with the dolphins, but appreciate it is not normal behaviour for them in that situation. They are trained beautifully and I was told they only did a limited amount each day. If you are a good /confident swimmer I would say the Dolphin Adventure would be better as this trip was very structured.

Fantastic. It was the most enjoyable experience. The staff at the encounter were excellent, and made the whole trip to dolphin bay so memorable. It is very expensive, especially by the time you have the photographs bought as well, but its a one off experience and definitely worth it

Up to expectations. it is very well organized, from the moment you arrive till the moment you leave.You have for your money, lots of fun and a unique experienceThe only bad surprise is the cost of photos

Family Friendly Dolphins were Gorgeous !. There was nothing to dislike, it was a very nice experience with 2 young children to witness the seals and dolphins performing all different tricks and we also had a family picture with the Dolphins after the show. It's bit expensive but worth the fees paid !

fabulous. loved the whole dolphin experience. well worth it if you ever wanted to secretly 'swim' with a dolphin. Our dolphin was Lisa and I still think of her fondly. What a great day and activity that was. They are well looked after and everything so well planned.
Dolphin Dive. A wonderful experience. I was very well looked after and the experience with the dolphin will remain as one of the most amazing things I have ever done.

An unforgettable experience! Amazing!. Swimming with the Dolphins has been a life long dream for me. And this experience superseded my expectations. We booked the Adventure package- you must be able to tread water and be above 8 years old.You get to kiss, dance, play and swim with a dolphin after you've been kitted out with wet suits (locker and shower facilities with towels are provided) and had a talk from one of the trainers. Photographers are on hand to take photos of the whole experience. If you love dolphins this is highly recommended! Once you've had your session cold drinks are provided. Definitely a must to tick off the bucket list - out of this world once in a lifetime experience. WOW!

Must do if you can afford. This is one of the most amazing thing I was lucky to do as I always thought to do this but always was concern about pricing though when I was in Atlantis it was slight cheaper like 675dhs per person compare last week of 775. I opted for it and it was just wow and amazing it's can't be explained in terms of review here. I feel it was one of the best thing I did during my 8 days of Dubai holidays. If okay with price which is not cheap than you can go for it and it will be one time experience.
just about ok. basically a dolphin experience factory. Make them wait, load them in, whizz them about, get them out. Next!!Not the really special experience it is packaged as being.

Dolphins at the Atlantis the palm. This was a highlight of our trip and I would have stayed there forever if I could. Great environment and staff and a very smooth "check in" process. BUT it's very expensive.
A must do!. For any expats living in Dubai, if you go around national day you ill get a much better deal for swimming with the dolphins. Amazing experience. Something to tick off the bucket list.

Life experience. My wife and I picked the dolphin adventure, as it included swimming with the Dolphins rather than just "encountering" them in shallow water.Swimming with the Dolphins was quite literally unbelievable! It is expensive, the trainers are kept to a tight schedule with the amount of people they have to deal with in a day, but it truly is a life experience. Most true life experiences do not come cheaply, but this was worth every penny. It did go quickly, but part of that feeling is because the activity is so surreal. The trainers are brilliant, knowledgable, and the animals are very well cared for. The pre-experience talk was also good, and set up the interaction. You get what you pay for, in the "adventure" a belly ride which is surprisingly lengthy, dancing, hugging, kissing and spinning with the dolphin, as well as touching it. We were separated from several groups of "encounters" which looked to be the busiest experience with the biggest group sizes. Fantastic on the whole, and unforgettable. Forget about the money and pay for this!
Worth going. It's not cheap but wel worth going, the staf are fantastic and seeing the Dolphins even better it's so calming here ,it's costly but worth every penny
Fun!. The whole experience was so so much fun! We had a great time intercating with the Dolphins! An absolute must do!

Enjoyable adventure. This is a really good experience. Very professional. On the downside you share the experience with others and it is rather crowded. 10 to a dolphin so it is not a personal family experience unless there are 8 to 10 of you. For the price per person you would think a family of 5 wouldn't have to 'share' the experience. Oh and you WILL get fleeced for the photograph. It is impossible to resist!

Starbucks. The Starbucks by Dolphin Bay is the BEST,, the staff really knew how to make the best drinks& the place was always so clean..Was so impressed with the whole place, I've booked to come back September 2015

Amazing!. We wanted a fun activity for our 2 year old and we were not disappointed. The staff were super organised and the experienced was just unforgettable. Our daughter talks about how she stroked a Dolphin all the time still.

Dolphins Dolphins ����. The dolphin bay is a must visit with your kids as you get not only to interact with the Dolphins but also play with them. My son truly enjoyed the experience. Will definitely go there again!

A must do when in Dubai!. Absolutely amazing! What a spectacular say and enjoyable for everyone.
