Best experience ever!. I loved the experience, every thing about the dolphin Bay was awesome. It was July and very hot but the bay was cold and refreshing. We had a pre training presentation about dolphins, very educational indeed. Had a scuba suit and then to the bay, there we had an instructor teaching us how to interact with dolphins and swim with them. My first time ever and would love to go again. It was price but worth it.

Nice. Brilliant, touched and played with the dolphins. it was amazing experience. I like the photographer shoot, he takes an excellent shoot of pictures during your fun with the dolphin But their price is tooooooo expensive to buy the picture.Come on! One picture by 80 dirham!

Birthday present for 11 year old. Really glad I booked the deep water experience as it is much better and interactive than the shallow water one for smaller kids. Dolphins are brilliant as are the trainers. We paid extra so i could stand at the side and take pictures - I wouldnt bother again as youre quite far away from the action so unless you have a professional camera its pointless. You can buy really good photos taken in the water and whilst they feel a little over priced its netted off by not paying to go and stand on the beach bit. Last point it started 40 mins late, not sure if thats a regular occurrence but no-one came out and told us ( otherwise this would have got a 5 star )

GREAT FUN!!. This place was awesome! The dolphins were fun to watch and interact with. The instructors were very knowledgeable and overall I enjoyed myself. I highly advise you to know how to tread water for long periods of time if you go. There is a resting area while you wait your turn but to truly experience it, know how to swim. Great show!!
Awesome!. Liked - small groups (of 10), knowledge and friendliness of staff, great organisation, efficiency of process (in spite of large numbers).Disliked - nothing!
Good for children. A must for the children, albeit very expensive. very well organised but again for only 30mins in the water - expensive

Amazing. An amazing and wonderful experience, Dolphins are so smart and was quite impressed. They are very soft and lovable creatures. My Dolphin SOI was quite playful and very smart definately worth the experience. The staff are very experienced and knowledgeable they show a video anda briefing on dolphins so when you get to see them you feel you know them already makes the experience even better. Downside is that they do not allow you take pictures they have thier own professional photographer(quite pricey!) but worth it as quite memorable experience once in a lifetime. Was there with my son and paid extra to be able to take close up pictures which was not worth it! as there pictures on sale any way!. Great and lovely experience
Fun with Dolphins. I had a great fun with these dolphins.Wish you not to miss this as well.Once in a lifetime experience.A place must be visited by the people who loves playing with Dolphins.

Celebrating my Wife's Birthday. This year was different Birthday party. I decided to celebrate my wife's birthday with a Memorable Experience, so I booked the Atlantis Dolphin Experience, which was memorable by getting Introduced to Tina the Dolphin, hugging, touching & swimming with Her.The staff where very helpful & knowledgeable.Thank You for the Expierence.
Great water park, very expensive. It's a great water park, especially for children who are going to have very nice with water attractions, but would not return because it is too expensive.
Best experience ever!. Who doesn't want the chance to swim with dolphins? It was quite simply amazing and i loved every minute. A MUST!!!

commercial. there are 4 different pools in which they stash 5 groups of 8 people each to encounter the dolphin. It came across as being too commercial and therefor was a disappointment for me as well as my daughter. The Sea-lion encounter on the other hand was very upclose and personal and far more enjoyable.

Quite simply the best experienec of my (and my Family's) life. When I looked at the price list I was uncertain, as it is not cheap, but I still went for the royal option, and I must say I did not regret it. Having a 16 year old daughter with a grin from side to side for 48 hours is priceless. All four of us enjoyed the event hugely, and I can honestly say it is the best experience of my life!The staff are superb, and the dolphins quite amazingYou must go and do it!

Best experience ever!. Amazing experience didn't feel real, the dolphins are so clever and so calming we had Carlos as the Dolphins trainer he was so good and made our experience a great one with the Dolphin, we really did enjoy it can't wait to go back again :)
WOW. If you coming to Dubai on holiday and have never experienced swimming with Dolphins it worth a visit, if you have kids or not.

Excellent time with the dolphins so smart. Make sure you feed the sting rays as well as this is even more interactive than the dolphins you are in with the rays , sharks and fish and feed them by hand so amazing
WOW!!!!!!!!! JUST AWESOME. This is an expensive activity but I would do it again. This is definitely one thing everyone should do! The staff are great and the dolphins just blow you away

Great to do once, especially with kids.. This is a very slick operation, there was 5 separate sessions going on in the time we were there, but you do not notice due to the layout of the bay. It is situated near the beach at The Atlantis. We booked in advance which is worth doing so you don't have to wait at the entrance, and I think if you book 14 days in advance you get a slight discount.The time in the water is 30 mins, but bear in mind you are in groups of ten so your time with the dolphin is not that long. My 3 and a half year old had fun, she is quite tall for her age and she was struggling to stand in the far end of the shallow area.Interaction with the dolphin includes a 'kiss', a 'hug' and playing by 'dancing' or 'throwing a toy', and they also come past the group numerous times and splash etc.It was very good fun to do once, and a nice experience for my daughter, but I would not do it again.Price isn't cheap however it does include access to the water park, which was great fun for all of us. I would recommend arriving as soon as the watermark opens, and staying all day.

Fantastic. I did the Royal Swim option at Dolphin Bay Atlantis as this was something I had wanted to do for years. It did not disappoint - everything was well organised and the trainers were all very friendly. The dolphins were incredible - ours was the lovely baby of the family, Hilma and our trainer was Alejandro. Our group was well looked after and good instruction was given. I enjoyed it so much I am going to go back and do it again when I return to Dubai next year.

Perfect Day. We had booked to swim with the Dolphins before we travelled. We were staying at the Atlantis so only had to get on one of the golf buggys which took us straight to Dolphin Bay. Once there we were given wet suits to change into and given a short presentation on the Dolphins and do's and dont's. We were split into groups of 6 per dophin and took it in turn to do various things with the dolphin such as get hug, kiss, dance and a swim. My daughter loved it. We bought our pictures which were lovely and a great way to remember the day and share with our friends and family.

Fantastic experience.. The staff, the location and most importantly, the dolphins were all fantastic and made for an unforgettable experience. The photographs taken by their photographer were a little disappointing but the memory will be there forever.

Had a great time with our Dolphin. You get free drinks when you show up and an education about dolphins. You have to get into wet suits in front of other people. Take off all your jewelry and hair things. It would have been nice to know that before we went or something to put those things in. You do get a free locker to put your stuff in. You need to have a private room if you ask me. We did the royal swim and it was fun to hang out with dolphin named Black. They had showers for you to use. They take you to where you can get a taxi. We had a 1 hour wait to get a taxi.

AMAZING EXPERIENCE!. Loved every moment with the dolphins, they are very well trained and are superb to watch, It was our first time to spend with dolphins and we loved it. The only down side was we could not take our own photos and therefore had to buy the professional ones, but looking back at the photos now... yes they were procey but so worth it!

One of the best attractions in Dubai. Went there with my family. Great attraction. Kids love it. As an advice book online so you don't wait at the entrance. We booked in the morning and we stayed all day there at the waterpark (you get free entrance to the waterpark with the reservation ) . Very well organized and the dolphins are great. Not to miss even if expensive. It could be once in a lifetime.

Much better than i expected. We booked a Royal Swim (for my daughter) and a Dolphin Experience (for my wife). I already knew that as a viewer I would have to pay another fee. Being a guest at Atlantis, this was 100AED (£18). We expected to be part of a very quick and expensive trip lasing no more than 30 mins. We were wrong.Prompt check in and we were asked to wait in another area before being taken to the changing rooms. After people selected there suits, it was off to a 30 minute video presentation about dolphins and Dolphin Bay. Very informative.There were approx. 10 people in the shallow water experience which was very acceptable. My daughter was in a group of 4 for the Royal Swim, meaning that she got to chat to the instructors.There are not that many things you can do with a dolphin, but photo opportunity with kisses, hugs and dances was ok for my wife, and my daughter also had a dorsal pull by two dolphins, and a boogie board push. Then her activity finished with a little show from 4 dolphins.All in, we were in the lagoons for 1 and half hours, staff were friendly and most of all, we all thought that the experience was great value for money.

Bucket List. You have to do this. You have no idea what its like...they are so special...dolphins are amazing! If you like to meet them then go to Atlantis Dolphin Bay... great staff... ma lot form South Africa!

Great field trip. I've been here as a teacher on a field trip with my students.The kids were so engaged with all the great activities, they got to touch the dolphins and interact with them.After there was free entrance at the water park. Highly suggested for prizes and or end of the year field trips!
Fun For Kids. Tickets are also available at the spot. 1 hour show with lot of fun with dolphins. its in creek park and great place to visit.

Fantastic. Myself, husband and two daughters (ages 6 and 7) did the dolphin experience. Although the experience is expensive, it was worth it for our family. For our eldest daughter to be able to touch and kiss a dolphin was a dream come true. The staff are very friendly and informative and we have such an amazing memory. Whilst you cannot take cameras into the water, you get the opportunity to purchase official photographs which can either be printed or put on a memory card.

Awesome experience!. My wife and I wanted to do something special for our honeymoon and Swimming with Dolphins was the answer. We cannot write highly enough of the experience at Dolphin Bay, it really was excellent. After a brief introduction we were all given a choice of wet suit or wet jacket to get changed into before heading for a formal induction. Here we learnt a little about Dolphins, how they train them, what to expect when meeting them and also about the way they are looked after (excellently!). The actual experience was in a group of about 8 and we all had the chance to kiss, hug and play with the Dolphin. We also got group experiences where the guides could tell us more about them and also ask them to perform some 'tricks'! The only downside, if there had to be one, is that the cost of the photos at the end is very high but obviously you want them so have to pay what they ask (about £110 for 8 photos and a memory stick). They are great quality and well presented but still a lot to fork out ontop of the actual experience. However, it's worth every penny - an awesome experience (which also includes entry to the Aquaventure water park).
Amazing!!. The whole experience from start to finish is wonderful. My daughter enjoyed every minute and the staff are brilliant

Way too overpriced, short session.. Me and my partner wanted to do something special for our 3 year anniversary and being Dolphin lovers we opted to swim with the Dolphins at the Atlantis, having never done it before and being a once in a lifetime experience we thought now is the best time. The overall experience was nice and a memory I will cherish forever but would I do it again at the Atlantis? No. Reason being was because it was way too overpriced for what you actually got. We opted to do the Atlantis Dolphin Encounter where all the interaction happens in shallow water so you get to kiss, hug, dance and stroke the dolphin a couple of times. That programme alone came to 870AED- £147.00 PER PERSON! Paying that much money you would only have high expectations of what you're about to experience. Instead they combined us in groups of 6 which means if you do the maths each couple spends a maximum of 10 minutes with the dolphin which is so time consuming consideringyou only have 30 minutes! In 10 minutes you and your partner would have already kissed the dolphin, danced with the dolphin and had your pictures done at the same time. When your turn was up you would just watch the other two couples in your group do what you just did and whilst they was preparing the other couple to receive the dolphin you was given permission to stroke the dolphin. They say on the itinerary you get to hug the dolphin? We never did that. We also felt the whole experience was very restricted in a sense that you are instructed on what to do, most of the time it's like being told to touch the dolphins belly touch the back now touch the tail it pretty much goes like that for half the time. During the 30 minutes you also have to decide if you would like to dance or throw the hoop in the water for the dolphin to catch. At this point I thought wow we are paying £147 why can we not do both and actually experience some fun with the dolphin. See where I am coming from now? Whilst I understand it costs a lot of money to maintain and train the Dolphins, Atlantis is not being fair in limiting the time we spend with the dolphin. What was even more of a ripe off was the photos! Oh, my gosh! You would think for the price you are paying these pictures should look immaculate but they don't, as you can see from the pictures I have attached you can see all the other people in the background also interacting with the dolphin and that for me personally just kills the picture. The couple who was with us actually complained and said she has had friends who has done the programme and their pictures looked amazing with no one in the background the woman just responded 'I'm sorry madam but this is how the pictures are taken'. In the end we got four pictures and one of us together in a frame which came to 460AED which was around £80. There are other photo packages there but be ready to spend. Also bear in mind that your dolphin ticket does include complimentary access to Aquaventure waterpark and their private beach. Whilst this was a nice experience I believe Atlantis should consider reducing the price of pictures and the encounter or allow people to actually spend more time with the dolphins because when they say 30 minutes you don't really enjoy 30 minutes of fun with the Dolphin. Maybe consider swimming with the dolphins at the dolphinarium in creekside park that looks to me as though you actually make the most of it and have fun. I hope this review was helpful.
Nice experience. It is a magical place for the little ones, they had a great time watching the dolphins. It's a little far from downtown, but worth it.
wonderful experience. Me and my wife had a wonderful time swimming with the Dolphins and we strongly recommend this to everyone that has time and budget for it.
Good Place for Families?. Good idea but a littel expensive.I visited this place before 4 years. Good Place for families and kids.

Very informative and friendly. Personal attention and one in a life experience .
Small groups, very well attended and explained.
All equipments were in exellent codition.
The guides were very well educated and replied well on personal needs.

AMAZING!. We had a great time doing a dolphin encounter. The south African man that did the introduction to the encounter was amazingly funny! We also had Carla and Alejandro who did our encounter and they were superb! The photographs are very expensive but they do let other guests (observers) watch and take photos of you from the sand!! We had Tina the dolphin! She was great!
Impressive. The dolphin experience was great. My kids loved to play with the dolphin and so did I. Something you can remember for all your life.
Just Feel the Dolphins. It was my childhood dream to swim with a dlphin and then i was dreaming about it . Now my dream came true and i just can't believe . The experience is just full of energy

Expensive but worth it. The time with the dolphins is short which should really be worked on, i booked this for my girlfriend more than myself but ended up enjoying it too, the groups are too big and definatly not enough time spent in the water for the price of it. the pictures i got were not the best either but you have to buy them, whihc almost copst the same price as the dolphin swim. would only recommend for small kids and if you wouldnt have the chance to do it again

Amazing experience. I really enjoyed this part of our trip. Swimming with dolphins is something you'll never forget. Professional approach of trainers makes it very comfortable and we had wonderful time. Though, very expensive, but definitely worth!!!
Fun for all. The kids love it...the parents enjoy...what a show...worth watching..you will relax to the limit...dont ever miss

Dolphin Bay. I did the Scuba dive with the Dolphins which was amazing - being under the water with them is a whole new experience. The staff were great and you get a lot of time with the dolphin without waiting for your go. very personal experience. Great day!
WORTH EXPERIENCING!. As you get closer to them , you feel an out of the world experience! try to strike poses and see the dolphins react to your actions !

Expensive , but good experience. Booked for wife's birthday and she loved it. Sets you back a bit money wise as its a short session when you compare the actual time spent per individual. Dolphins are the star and wife was ecstatic. Job done!

Dance with dolphins. Poor and fast program. Not exclusive approach even with most expensive Royal swim - 6 persons in the group. Too much theory before the swim itself.
Prohibited to take your photos, nevertheless, we bought their very good and professional pictures after the program (~20$ per pic)
Amazing. Amazing experience, photography overpriced as always but you cannot not take this memory away with you. Lifetime experience, really recommend!

Dolphin Endorphins!. The setting was Atlantis elaborate, the staff and trainers were well informed and made the experience warm and fun. The dolphins were obviously happy, healthy and very much loved by their carers. The participants were well managed and both dolphins and humans enjoyed a safe, happy, fun experience. We would recommend it to everyone.

Nice but overpriced!. The overall experience was great. Very well organised and friendly instructors. However I felt it was way over priced! We went for the Dolphin Adventure which was for almost 800 AED per person, so I had higher expectation on what we will get. Instead they combined us in groups of 6 and each one spent a very short time with the dolphins. I know it should not be very cheap and it costs a lot to have the amazing creatures safe and all but at least it should be worth the money. What was even more of a ripe off .. was the photos! After you finish they show you the photos taken and of course you want to take them all .. so you have to pay extra 500 AED (at least) to take them on a USB!!Again, it was a nice experience but I believe Atlantis should consider reducing the price or allowing people to spend more time with the dolphins. Oh and do something about the very expensive photos as well.
Excellent value. The venue was nicely located and reasonably priced. Good entertainment for all the family especially kids.

great, but it's too short session. great experience, valuable price, good instructors, Sunny dolphin is friend for ever!but really guys the session is too short, if make it longer its great to bring my daughters even every week, they love it so much

Great experience!. Brilliant experience! had a great time with our trainer and our dolphin S2 :) it's really great that they allow visitors of participants to relax on the beach and watch and take pictures if they wish which was a good touch! everything is included in the price: towels, lockers, a nice drink afterwards, and access to the water park really well worth the money! Had a great experience! Definitely recommend! :)

Really nice to swim with the dolphins. We got clear instructions on what and what not to do with the dolphins. The swim with them was really nice and a truly unique experience that I can recommend to anyone.

Unique experiences.. One of the best place I've visited that gave our family really unique experiences. Very well-organized, experienced staffs that made my kids totally fell in love with the lovely dolphin.

A must. This is a once in a life time experience that you will never forget. Very expensive but worth every penny. Do the royal swim where possible, the staff are brillant as my partner isn't s gud swimmer & they gave him loads of 1:1 support

Best reason to come to Atlantis. We loved being in the water with dolphins , very enjoyable well organised
Staff very attentive and friendly

conveyor belt. Really enjoyed my dolphin experience, beautiful creatures.
the trainers were very knowlegable and caring.
The experience did feel rushed, it was expensive and not quite value for money, photos, which of course you would buy were also on the expensive side, but what an experience!
Excellent. great place, wonderful staff, nice facilities. It is something that I would highly recommend. Staff are very professional and of course...the Dolphins are real stars !

Grand experience. We really enjoyed swimming with the dolphins It was well organized. Staff was really knowledgeable and helpful
We would definitely recommend!!!!!!

WOW! Overwhelmed. I have always wanted to do this and today I got my chance and OMG it was everything and more! The staff the Dolphin Trainers and Lexie the Dolphin were fantastic! This is a must do once in a lifetime experience that I will cherish for life! Awesome!

Just love those dolphins!!!!. What an experience!!!! I've swam with dolphins a few times now but each time gets even better than the last. Sharing the water with these incredible creatures is an honour. One day later I want to do it again!!!The staff here were so knowledgeable and enthusiastic, which make the experience e so good. I did the shallow swim and lived hugging, dancing, playing and kissing the dolphin! I know there are other experiences they offer for higher prices like being pushed around the pool which I have done before. I just don't think it is worth it plus I don't think you get as close to these amazing animals.Only bad point was the cost of photos but that is more due to the classless penny pinching attitude of the Atlantis where Dolphin bay is situated.Would I recommend Dolphin Bay and/or come back again? Massive yes on both counts!!!!

Excellent morning. My husband and I did the Adventure programme, based in deep water. You must be a good swimmer and able to tread water well, if this is the case then this option is far more fun! There were only 4 in our group with one dolphin so lots of hands-on and pulled across the pool too!

An experience I will never forget. I had a huge pleasure of swimming, cuddling, dancing and even having a peck with Butterlily or Lily for short :) Such a cute, well behaved, beautiful, elegant baby dolphin. Staff were amazing as well!

Lovely experience. My partner and I spent one day at the Waterpark, and we booked this dolphin experience as well.Wow.. it was just amazing to be able to be close to those lovely creatures, hug them and swim with them.The dolphin trainers are very professional and able to explain everything you need to enjoy your experience.Would definitely love to come back!

Fabulous experience!. Did the Royal Swim whilst on holiday in Dubai. It was a wonderful experience. I was booked in the afternoon session and although my partner and I arrived a bit early we were given a stone which buzzed when they were ready for me! My partner came in with me whilst we had a talk about dolphins and he could stand on the man made sand whilst I did the swim. There were only five of us in my group and we took it in turns to be pulled by two dolphins through the water, then one dolphin put his nose on my foot and pushed me whilst I was on a board which was a wonderful feeling. We then got to hug and kiss the dolphin and hold him when he was on his back. Great once in a lifetime experience.

Amazing experience. Simple if your in Dubai it's a must do, great couple of hours the trainers are fantastic and really look after you and of course the dolphins are just brilliant , we done the dolphins experience which is done in shallow Walter but they have many different experiences,

Worth the heavy price tag!. We did the royal swin and really really enjoyed it. As guest of the Atlantis hotel we got a discount but it was still pricey for the two of us. If it is something you are only going to do once in a lifetime then I recommend the royal swim. The instructors were really friendly. If you are a family and only one of you wants to take part they will happily let the remainder of the family into the facilities beach to watch and take pictures. Really recommend this was such good fun. Just wish it lasted a little longer.

very nice experience. Even though we swim with Dolphins in their natural space in Mauritius, we enjoyed playing with Sol, our dolphin in Atlantis. Very secured and they pay lot of attention to the dolphin's security and health. Not so cheap though

An Amazing Experience. We went for the Royal Swim and it was well worth it! We had a brief tutorial on the do's and don'ts before hand which was very useful and helped calm any nerves we had before hand. Within 30 minutes of arriving we were in the water in a group of just four with our own dolphin, the trainers are very knowledgeable and extremely helpful in helping you get the most from your experience. We had some great interaction with the dolphin and some amazing tricks and lagoon crossings literally being pulled along and pushed by the dolphins. The professional pictures were stunning if a little pricey, we went for the USB stick which allowed us to take home all 50 of the photos for a reasonable price in comparison to the prints.We will be doing it again for sure!
Birthday treat. Amazing hands on experience dolphins seem happy in a man made environment and staff are very knowledgable

Amazing Dolphin Bay. I paid for my wife to do the Dolphin kiss. She had wanted to do this all her life. The look of joy on her face when she met Hilma is now in my head forever, I would of paid double the fee for the feeling of well being this experience has bought. The staff were lovely, and extremely helpful. This attraction is not cheap, but then again I should imagine neither is running it! But as I said the fee pales into insignificance when I saw the joy on my wife's face. Hilma was lovely, she knew how emotional this experience was for my wife, so much so that she wouldn't leave her alone, even when her trainer called her back! Thank you to all concerned.

Great experience. We really enjoyed swimming with the dolphinsIt was well organised but we found it hard to understand why when great fuss made of removing jewellery and being able to swim well one person in our group had bracelets and rings on and relied on others to keep her afloatBit expensive really but once in lifetime tripPhotos expensive too

Amazing experience. We were staying at Atlantis so couldn't not - even though at £100 per head including my 2 and 3 year old boys I did think it was steep. But I figured it was one of those everlasting holiday memories, so went for it.We were not disappointed. Dolphin Bay is immaculately well kept, well organised, and you can tell the Dolphins are brilliantly well cared for. The visit is educational and the kids loved it - and of course you come away with your souvenir photos which are also really good - first time in my life I have felt like I could be in a holiday brochure!
OMG! Amazing!. You must do this. Royal swim with the dolphins. Comes with complimentary access to the waterpark too. Unmissable

Dolphin interaction Atlantis. Very expensive, and you don't even get to interact with the dolphins yourself. There are 10 or more other strangers at the same time as you and you don't even get to interact or properly touch the animals. You stand in the water whilst the attendants play around with the dolphins and do stunts. You only get to stroke it gently. Still beautiful to watch them. If you cannot afford this, no problem you can still view it from the edge free of charge.

Don't miss this Dolphin-swim :o). My son turned 12 with nobody home but me, so we decided to celebrate by swimming with dolphins at Atlantis - we have often talked about this, but never gotten around to it.Dolpin Bay is a beautiful area, the staff was great and very attentive and everything was very organized and professionally run.The swim was amazing, could have stayed in the water with Pifale the dolphin all day. We got hands on and lots of interaction - a truly wonderful experience :o)My son is sure, that he will never forget his 12th birthday - it was the day he decided to become a Marine Biologist <3
Pricey, but a good experience. The basic package was for petting / playing with the dolphin and not swimming. This suited our family as we had small children.

WHALE TALE. I have never been this close to a Dolphin and the experience was really one to savour. They all looked so happy and at peace with the instructors. The icing on the cake was getting a kiss from the dolphin
great. Amazing experience but overly priced! Where as the dolphin instructors are super friendly keeps you less nervous when swimming

Very good closeup encounter with dolphins. Very well organised with different levels of interaction from viewing to knee deep and swimming encounters. Not rushed and the staff are very helpful and informative.

Dolphin Bay is a celebration to enjoy with kids.Unimaginable entertainment and adventures to witness the show.. All educational institutes and family's must watch Dolphin Bay for childrens and teens to witness the spectacular and adventures show to learn from the nature.Just enjoy the moments....
ATLANTIS PALM DUBAI. Wonderfull place.Rooms were excellant .outdoor water activities were fabulous. Dolphin bay was an experience
HANG OUT WITH BUTTERLILLY. Our dolphin, a female called Butterlilly is a very friendly and happy animal. My kids loved to play with her.

Experience of a Lifetime. After taking part in the Dolphin Encounter experience I can honestly say I have not done anything this memorable in a very long time. It was my first time even seeing a dolphin and I loved every minute. Being able to kiss, hug and dance with the dolphin was awesome. All the staff were fantastic and so friendly. You can see that they all love their jobs and the dolphins obviously love them! After the experience I purchased some souvenirs which were I thought were very good value for money. I can't wait to return!

Pricey. Expensive. But then you do get an oppurtunity to buy a picture of yourself with a dolphin...Organised well staff very informed but too exoensive for the 20 minutes in the water with a dolphin 2 instructors and 10 other people all paying about £120 each. Thats £1200 for 40 miuntes!!!
Amazing experience. Even though the dolphin experience is rather expensive, it is still definitely well worth it! The dolphins are highly trained and are a really friendly and playful.

Great experience. I had a wonderful time swimming with Pifale the dolphin. It was a magical experience that I recommend when going to Aquaventure. Make sure you make an early booking to get some time after the swim for the slides in the waterpark.

Expensive but worth it. Expensive at over £100, but memories that last a lifetime, also get free admission to waterpark and free soft drinks, be aware the free viewing area wont allow your family and friends to take pictures unless you are in the pool right next to viewing area, otherwise you might want to pay to spectate, then you can view from waters edge and take your own photos as its about £80 for all the photos on a usb and £14 for one picture

Amazing Experience. This is definitely worth visiting. My 3 teenage children attended and were enthralled throughout. I could also "observe" which was close enough to enjoy the experience too. You can take your own pictures (no video) and although pricey at 500AED for purchased pictures they are definitely worth it.
Dolphin Adventure. Loved every minute of my dolphin adventure shared with my son. A once in a lifetime experience. It may have been expensive but it was worth it.

Rip off. Dolphin experience fantastic! Not the extra £12.50 each to stand and watch your son with dolphin, we had 7extra in our family group which meant it would of cost us 85.00£ in just to watch so wrong I think!!!
Great experience. Well organised, easy access especially if staying at the hotel and for some a chance in a lifetime. A joy to watch the children's faces

5 stars in terms of experience, 1 star (or even less!!!) in terms of access policy. Amazing experience for my girlfriend, no doubt about it.Location is extremely cute and well mantained.Staff is extremely professional, and so kind.However, the experience is very expensive: 200 euros per person (for the average package 30 minutes): but the very crazy and unbelievable thing is that YOU HAVE TO PAY 300 DIRHAMS TO SIMPLY ACCOMPANY YOUR WIFE (because they OBLIGE you to pay THE FULL AQUAVENTURE TICKET EVEN IF YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO SWIM!!!! So, you pay 60 euros just to stay in the beach at 50 degrees with no refreshment up to the end of the show.YOU PAY 200 euros and you do not even get 1 picture of the dolphin experience for free!!!! ASHAME!!!!!YOU PAY 60 euros JUST TO ACCOMPANY YOUR WIFE!!! ASHAME!!!

Pre-book online. Don't go there expecting to get in straight away. Pre-book online for fast track service. Also, if you are seeking one-on-one time spent with the dolphins without groups expect to pay £875 ridiculous.

So much fun. A good family day out. You have to book in advance. You get to kiss the dolphins, touch them, watch a display. Theres someone nearby taking photos for you to pick from at at the end of the show. You can get hard copies and a hard drive with the pictures.
Cherished Experience. Holding and kissing the dolphins was a memorable experience, it's etched in my mind. Try it if you love dolphins.

Swimming with Flipper. Booked this for my wife and son, they both enjoyed it thoroughly.My wife had the Royal Swim. Very informative pre swim talk on Dolphins and most importantly it was all done in a way that didn't feel Disney'd...Expensive for me to watch £50.00 considering I was just taking pics, although the price included access to the water park that wasn't my thing so beware of extra costs.
A dolphin experience of note. A brilliant experience and well worth the money. Do book the dolphin encounter so you can actually swim with the dolphons

Experience of a lifetime !. My visit to the Dolphin Bay was an experience of a lifetime, especially since it was my first time to see the beautiful creature. The Dolphin Bay is located at quite a distance from the Aquventure Waterpark - so kindly ensure that you reach on time. Though there are buggies available pretty frequently that will take you to Dolphin Bay.The pricing of the Dolphin Bay experience is pretty steep - we had booked the Dolphin Bay Photo Fun for AED 425 (including the AV waterpark). The experience lasted for about 20 minutes and had about 10 people alongwith me. The dolphins are very well trained and you shall be entertained for the whole 30 minutes.Trust me, this is one place you wouldn't want to miss just in case you are visiting The Atlantis Hotel at Palm Jumeirah

Honeymoon Swim. The most amazing experience of my life. I absolutely loved every minute of it. Our trainer was a girl from Kent who was delightful to work with. She made you feel safe and well informed at all times. I want to do it again and would in a heart beat.It was all first class from wet suits to information prior to entering the water. Some amazing picture souvenirs too. :)

A Birthday treat never to be forgotten. Fantastic time our family of 4 went for little girls 7th birthday we booked the swim with dolphins the event went fast and was expensive but hey don't all amazing experiences. We swam,danced and touched the dolphins for about an hour then afterwards we had admission the the massive water park at the Atlantis as well which was included in price and again fantastic and can only be Dubai..!!!

Worth Its Weight In Gold For The Photographs of My Wife and Children. As others have mentioned, the Royal Swim is not cheap by any stretch of the imagination and whilst the ticket does include 'free' entrance to the Aquaventure Water Park, you cannot use/eat at the outlets at The Atlantis The Palm - they stop you as it is for residents only. Needless to say, this leaves very few and over-priced food outlets for you to use.But the dolphin experience blows all negative thoughts away and being in close proximity with the dolphinss really does seem to be as therapeutic as people say.Quick 15 minute instruction and then about 30 minutes in the water with the dolphins and groups are kept to 4 or 5 people and so you do get some quality time with the dolphins.All of the instructors are friendly, jovial and seem to adore their charges and we would definitely do this again and would recommend this to anyone considering it.

Loved it!. The trainers have a really good rapport with the Dolphins, and a very good knowledge of them. Their main concern is for the animals welfare, and everything is done with this in mind. we thoroughly enjoyed meeting the Dolphin, and learning all about her. Worth every penny.

Great experience, at a cost. My partner and I split up the activities as she wasn't a confident swimmer. She did the basic dolphin encounter while I did the royal swim. This is a very cool experience to be up close and touch a dolphin if you have never done so. However, it really is only a short amount of time you have with the dolphins while you are in groups. To make this whole attraction worthwhile and store your memories, you should purchase the professional pictures shot by their photographers. Given we were in different sessions, they wouldn't let us purchase the 650 AED USB package, but upsold us to the 850 AED package with USB, poster and 10 prints. Of course, we went with the more expensive option, didn't mind as we understand it is costly to run a dolphin habitat. Make sure you allocate enough time to use the water park after as it's included in the price of the dolphin activity.

Fantastic experience. We booked a dolphin encounter and do not regret it one bit. Had a great time.The water was nice and cool on a hot Dubai day, and the whole experience was memorable. We bought a few photos of the experience, which weren't cheap, but still worthwhile at AED80 each.

How much!!!. Dolphin experience was good and the place itself is well run with good facilities. My real problem is with the pricing which is scandalous. Having paid close to £200 for a dolphin experience I learn that we have to pay either £8 or £13 for a locker in the water park. This fee is NON REFUNDABLE and its the same for all visitors to the water park. I find it very unpleasant that any water park charges for storage facilities, it should be provided and included as part of the cost of the entry ticket. A large family would easily need 3 or 4 large lockers costing close to £50 which is a joke. People need a place to put their stuff, did you not expect that??? Stop it please.Pictures from the dolphin experience > well what can I say. If I had realised beforehand the costs of these items I may well have hired a photographer for the day as it would probably work out cheaper. £83 yes £83 for a 2GB usb stick with a few images on! And that was one of the cheaper options! Far too expensive and you guys are being too greedy in this area. How about trying a new business model = charge much less and more people will buy stuff? It just might work...
the kids love it. not everyday you get to get up close with dolphins. the dolphin experience or royal swim are the two good options. pricey but then you are on holiday!
Amasing. It was my most amasing experience ever! I hugged, kissed and played with a dolphin named catty. Don't miss it! Say my hello to catty :-*

So nice experience!!. A so nice experience, and so unique!...a bit too much expensive but for something you'll do one time in your life it's something you don't have to miss.Price of pictures is really too too much expensive..But pictures quality is at the top.

Uk traveller - great experience. Visited early August 2014. Booked deep water experience from hotel before we visited two days later. Got taxi to Atlantis and ticket included waterpark admission. Great experience in groups of 5/6 with a dolphin ( Hilma ) in our group and two trainers. Five exercises done with dolphin - suits and vests keep you afloat - so don't worry about the deep water ! Photographer makes sure pics are taken of each exercise. Buy photos afterwards at great cost. USB of 50 pics cost £82. But it was a great experience to be fair and recommended.

Must Visit. i will recommend if you are travelling to dubai with your family, you must visit this place. kids enjoy dolphin shows. Its a fun to kiss these beautiful dolphins. Most amazing experience of my life.

Life changing. okay my title is a bit dramatic but swimming with dolphins has always been pretty high up on my bucket list and I must say it was a great experience. I did the shallow waters experience where you kiss, play, touch, dance and take a family photo with the dolphin. I want to do the deep water experience next time i visit.

Puts a premanent smile on your face. Indeed as others mentioned, it was expensive, it was too short (don't we always want more when we are having fun?), it was .... For me, a once in a life time experience !You can not take a camera with you in the water and the photos are overpriced, I know , I know...Still, the feeling of happiness I had during this short encounter, was able to erase temporarily the physical and emotional pain I was experiencing at the time. Tip for girls: before you go, make sure you have taken off nail polish , chemicals and bling blings (can't tie your hair, can't wear jewellery).
Must for dolphin lovers. Approx 45 mins Dolphin show. Good to watch them dance on music. Kids will love it . Park is also beautiful. If u r wid kids then also go for Birds show.
Royal swim. We booked the royal swim in July this year. My fiancée and I really enjoyed it and got some really good photos. The experience although expensive was so good.

Swim with Dolphins. A must, we took our children (5 and 8) and had a shallow swim encounter... The staff were fantastic and the Dolphins beautiful.. A must if you can. Although be prepared to get stung for the pictures afterwards!

See Sealion Point!. Having visited Dubai on many occasions, I seek to find a new adventure on each visit. I have experienced the surreal and memorable Dolphin Bay and its dolphin interaction on a previous visit and was delighted to discover that a new sea lion interaction is now available to visitors. This is an educational and once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get up-close to these exquisite and elegant creatures, whilst learning more about them from Sea Lion Point's friendly and informative staff. Some may consider the 595 dirhams pricey given that visitors receive only 30 minutes of the interaction in the water with a resident sea lion; however, the overall experience is excellent. Visitors can expect all equipment (wet suits, towels and lockers) to be provided along with a cold drink at the end of the interaction. Photography is not permitted by visitors; however, a professional photographer is present and visitors can choose, without any pressure, to purchase photographs or photograph packages. Admittance to Aqavenuture waterpark is also included in the price of the interaction making this a fun day out for all ages.

Worth a visit. Staying at the Atlantis, a visit to Dolphin Bay is recommended. We would of liked the Royal Swim option but my son was only 11 and the minimum is 12. We took the next option down which was still very much worth while as it had enough Dolphin interaction. The only small point was that we would have liked a photo with the Dolphin as a family of 4 but it was not offered. For the price shoud have been as lower priced options had it included. Maybe you should request it before your time was up. Just a tip.

First time try. My wife booked and tried this, nice dolphin bay area, not that much time one on one with a dolphin, as it was a group session, could work expensive for a one on one session compared to other country's we have swam with dolphins, friendly staff and no real complaints from us

Great experience. Especially if you are a certified PADI scuba diver , yourselves and you children will enjoy these excursions . Some other adventures you may wanna reconsider though is the shark safari at the Aquaventure Waterpark: really no meaning as the sharks are laying on the bottom of the pool. Ray feeding is great though and snorkeling will let you enjoy closer some of your favorite fish species.

Amazing Experiences. My Husband did the Dolphin Adventure in the deep part of the lagoon whilst I took photos, I then did the shallow water experience with my 5 year old Son which was just breath-taking. The Dolphins are amazing and the whole experience was thoroughly enjoyable, definitely the highlight of our Atlantis holiday.The staff were very knowledgeable and both of the experiences were very well and expertly delivered.I would highly recommend Dolphin Bay and return in a heart beat and would love to do the deep water adventure that my husband did.

beautiful experience. We went on the shallow experience and it was well worth the money. They provide everything you need and give you a short talk beforehand so you really understand the dolphins. We played with Sol, a male dolphin, and he played ball, danced with use and had such a lovely relationship with its trainer.

Do it. Spend the day at the water park, then swim with the dolphins. Was an amazing experience, only 6 in the group so didn't have to wait long for the next experience . Complimentary Cold drinks at the end. Only grip would be the cost of photos. VERY expensive. USD 550 for a USB stick with photos on. If possible go with someone who is not interested in swimming with the dolphins & get them to be an observer( costs but not much) & take photos. Water park is not cheap to go to anyway so do go for the day.

Fun for all!. A lot of fun for all. A lot of different activities available, but you must book in advance! Get really close to the dolphins, play with them, ride on them, dance with them, kiss them. The people there speak a load of languages and know very good English. The guides also do a wonderful, informative presentation before the activities, and they also know the answers to any questions you may have about the dolphins. There is also a photographer there, so don't forget to collect your photos after the activities.
Great fun with family. Very good Dolphin show, equally enjoyed by kids and adults. Varities of shows keep audience engrossed. In between magic shows was also very amazing.
Exciting. Kids enjoyed the dolphins show. Atlantis really does have a very comprehensive set up of attractions.
Dolphin experience. My 12 year old really enjoyed this. A memorable and fun experience for both of us - glad we paid for the deep water swim - super fun to kiss and get towed by the dolphin
Great fun for kids, but expensive. Wonderful experience especially for children, but expensive even before they fleece you for photos. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Amazing creatures. We have visited this as a family. Well organised event but the basic one is little to short. Anyway is worth visiting as the trainers takes a lot of care of dolphins and experience is incredible. One disadvantage which I dont like is that you can not take pictures in water or cary GoPro to film this. There are semi pro photographers and after this you can buy those photos.

Swimming with the Dolphins. Amazing experience, I done the encounter experience. Staff were so friendly and they helped you from A-Z. A short presentation/training was given before stepping out. Dolphins were so cute!
A dream come true. This is not your regular dolphinarium just exploiting these magnificent creatures. It was a lifetime experience for me. Have lost my heart to the alpha-female Lisa....

Great experience. It was a little artificial which is to be expected, however an amazing experience to hug a dolphin! The photo sale opportunity can be pricey we thought the USB option was the best option.
Great for the kids. Your kids will love it. You will get an interaction with the dolphins. U can dance,play,and kiss them. It is really worth the visit

Lovely, but rude trainer. Myself and my friend had a lovely time with the dolphins, however it was dampened by our experience of a rude female trainer (I think her name was Ana?).
It is pricey, but an excellent experience, especially if you're staying at the Atlantis.

Experience of a Lifetime. When visiting Atlantis The Palms, this is something that must not be missed & one does not have to be an accomplished swimmer to take part - there is something for everyone. To be able to swim with the dolphins was truly a memorable experience. Would definitely recommend this activity.

Magical Experience. We took the children(3 & 5) to Dolphin Bay on the photo fun experience.
What an amazing experience. Its not cheap but well worth it!

Great way to spend my 40th Birthday. I booked myself and my friends into Dolphin Bay on the adventure package. One friend spectated while the 3 of us went in the bay with the Dolphins, we all thoroughly enjoyed it, it was an amazing morning. We all kissed the dolphin, hugged the dolphin, danced with the dolphin plus more. We all chipped in and purchased the USB stick pictures taken by the photographer for 500 AED, although the spectator was pretty near also and managed to get some good close ups. We all then went in to the adventure park where we spent the day, it was an amazing place.

Above expectations.... We booked the encounters dolphins, my wife pregnant, kids of 3 and6 and got a excellent moments documented with great pictures... Will all remember it for life... A myst do in dubai...

Fabulous Fun. We took my daughter who was visiting us from the States. We all did the Royal Swim. It was superb. The Dolphin handlers were so informative and the Dolphins were like people and so playful!!!

Wonderful experience!. I bought the Atlantis Dolphin Encounter for my husband and he loved it and said it was worth every penny! As a spectator you didn't get to see much but I didn't mind as we paid for me to go to the Atlantis Water park after. The person doing the dolphin experience gets free entry into the water park. I purchased it online before our holiday and it was much cheaper. I would avoid going there on a Friday and Saturday if you can as it's really busy - we made that mistake! You get to purchase a lovely photographic memento after the encounter which we felt was reasonably priced. We would definitely do this again when we are in Dubai next and possibly take our 3yr old this time.
Royal Swim. Absolutely fantastic and worth every cent. Great education on the dolphins and quite simply so much fun. Would do it again in a heart beat!
Kissed a Dolphin and got to dance with them. My son loved the dolphin experience. He got to hold onto it s fins and dance with it. You get your photo taken as part of

Fantastic!. What a great experience! I felt like a 5 years old child... just couldn't stop laughing! :) There are three options of experience, we had the Atlantis Dolphin Adventure. The entire interaction takes place in deep water, but you don't need to be a great swimmer (i'm not!), just have to be able to tread water (and the clothes you'll put on will also help you with that). There are 6 guests per dolphin and you stay 30 minutes in the water. It was so much fun! Not cheap, but totally worth the money. You can't take any cameras to the pool area, but there's a professional photographer taking pictures so you can buy later. One bad thing: even though we had already bought our tickets on the website, we had to stand in a long line to get our access into the park.

Fun but too short. The interaction with the dolphins is great but very short. You do a couple of nice things with them and there is time to touch them. We booked the Royal Swim but everybody was doing the same things with the dolphins. Nobody checked which package you booked. It is difficult to advies wether or not it is worth the money

special experience. Not cheap but worth the money, try to make a reservation online and not during weekends, Watch the movie and explanations before swimming with the dolphins, our trainer Augustin was very careful and explained us lots of things we did not previously know about the dolphins, If possible avoid Chinese large groups since they are very, very noisy, they do not speak English and are very undisciplined.
Very expansive. If you have a family it was a bit too much to spend to play and swim with dolphin for 30 minutes but the location quite good but the heat was unbelievable very warm

Humble Humans!. Fantastic, there is nothing to dislike! It takes around one hour from start to finish, first they give you a 15 minute talk about the dolphins.They supplied water and towels, also wetsuits. We went for the full wetsuit to protect us from the sun but they also do vests.No hair bands, grips or sun cream but you can put some on your face. This is a must as the weather and water together will make you burn.Wonderful for children, adults alike, also a good experience for the handicapped.The team are brilliant, water clean, dolphins look healthy and happy.They take photos whilst you are in the water with the dolphins, expensive but worth it. You do not have to buy! There is also a shop to buy dolphin goodies.

An experience shame about the photos. I booked this before visiting Dubai. Shouldn't have as cheaper if book when staying in hotel in Dubai. Booked the middle package which was the deep water experience. Well worth the money to have a cuddle and a swim with a Dolphin. Down side is cost of photos the camera man takes and if you do this on your own or as a couple you don't have any other way of obtaining photos other than buying them from the booth. Extortionate prices so be prepared!
Beautiful. Amazing experience that everyone has to do. The staff are so good and very knowledgeable about the marine life they look after, all the dolphins etc are treated incredibly well.

Brilliant experience. had a brilliant time the team had brilliant knowledge and was fluent in different languages. they where very friendly and was always making sure that everyone was okay! i would recommend if someone isn't doing the experience they can see the lagoon from the entrance and will be able to get some pictures from there. the pictures that the professionals take are expensive but are good quality.
Trip highlight. This was a brilliant experience. The trainers are very friendly and the dolphins are clearly looked after well and very happy.
Worth doing. A great experience swimming with the dolphins even if you feel like your being pushed along in your session. The photo packages are cheap but its a once in a lifetime experience.
Disappointing. The interaction is short and oversold. Not as intimate as I would have liked or expected but the kids enjoyed it!
Priceless. We made our arrangements well in advance and this was certainly a highlight of our trip, extended personal time with the Dolphin is amazing!

Meet Mr. Dolphin. Personally for me, i love meeting them in their own homes rather than in enclosures, but as i was here, wanted to see how its been done and was satisfied that Its well managed and the trainers explained how they take care of this intelligent mammals and what goes into training them to do this tricks by positive methods..As i was solo, i chose the cheapest experience at 600 AED per person, rest of my friends went into the water-park.. Got to spend some time with a lovely dolphin named Sol, was highly impressed with his skills and loved it, when he came to give me a hug :-)Paying 80 AED per photo was a bit steep, but bought 3 photos as remembrance..

Great Experience. One of those things you'll do once and remember. If you are going as a family, here's a suggestion. One parent go in the water with the kids while the other stays on the shore to take pictures. Dolphin Bay has a photographer taking pictures from the shore and they do a great job - we bought the DVD of all the pictures involving us. It's expensive! The parent on the shore has just as good a photo shoot as the employee - need to have a telephoto. When it comes time to kiss the dolphin, it's only natural to be looking at the dolphin - don't. Instead, smile and look at the shore so the picture will show you with a great smile with close up of the dolphin right beside your face.

Incredible experience!!!. I did the Royal Swim, my husband and 4 year old daughter did the Dolphin Encounter. Amazing!! Wow, what an incredible experience, we all loved every single minute of our experience. The Royal Swim was amazing, the dolphins take you for an amazing ride, unforgettable. My daughter cannot believe she got to kiss a dolphin. Staff amazing. Whilst not cheap, it was worth every single penny and we'd all happily do it all again if we had the chance. Highly recommended for all ages!
dolphin encounter. amazing,best value for money, a once in a lifetime treat don't miss out this is wonderful, well organised and staff are brillant.

Perfect for kids. This is a great chance to get to see the dolphins and interact with them. When you arrive to the bay, the organization gives you towels, special swimsuits and a very short but important briefing of the dolphins and the experience that you are about to live. Then you go to the beach in groups of eight people or so, with two instructors that show you how to touch the dolphins, the basics signs they understand, etc. You play with them, you can also dance with one if you want to. I recommend this attraction.

One of those moments to remember / combine it with the water park. We did a royal dolphin swim here and it was fantastic. Dolphins were amazing and very talented. It was expensive, but worth every penny. You should combine the dolphin swim with the water park.
High Point of Atlantis Dubai. What an experience ! Amazing to touch, play, hug, hold, kiss and get clicked with the most beautiful and friendly water animal.

Choose your programe attentively. Dolphins are must experience in life. But you have to choose your program attentively before booking. All of them quite expensive, specially for couples or family groups.We took the lowest price program (300$ for 2 person) which was about one kiss and one dance with dolphin only. But this is for not swimmers or families with kids. Groups are 10 people each one for 1 dolphin. So generally it is about to wait standing in a very cold water while other 9 people are doing what you've just done. And don't think you will make lots of photos yourself. They have a photographer for each group and then sell you photo they've made for 80 AED each one printed. To get them all electronic will cost you fortune.The good point is: for that price you also have opportunity to stay the whole day in aqua park there and enjoy beach and other attractions which are very exciting.They also tried to make program not a waiting boring queue by adding some information about dolphins while you are waiting. It was a great experience generally but too little for high price and not much wow memories left afterwards...specially after trying all extremal attractions in the Aquaventure.If you are not a family with kids try a royal swimming or diving with dolphins better.

Amazing experience. We stayed in dubai for 5 days and this was one of the things to do on our wish list. A beautiful place for amazing encounter. I only wish I knew about the scuba diving with dolphins when we were booking through our hotel as I would of loved to have done that rather than the swim in the shallow end. The staff were very helpful and friendly and it was nice not to be waiting about for the experience.Would recommend to family and friends and next time I will scuba dive with the dolphins.Can't wait to go back

Royal dolphin swim. Our royal dolphin swim was a fantastic experience! There is not many places in the world where you can have two dolphins take you for a ride so we were very excited. The whole program is extremely professional and very well run. You get to spend a long time in the water with the dolphins and we loved every minute!

Amazing experience. Really enjoyed this. It was one of the best days of my life. I opted for the deep water one. Warning the water was freezing but the wetsuit kept me nice and warn.The staff were very helpful and friendly and made the experience better. Highly recommended.

Incredible Experience. Dolphin Bay was one of the most exciting things I've done with my family and is definitely a must do for Dubai. You can pick either from swimming with dolphins and racing (for more older people as its in the deep) or dance, hug and kiss the dolphins (more family friendly). Definitely 100% AMAZING!!!!!!!!
Unique Experience. Amazing experience despite the fact you only touch the dolphin a few times. I was skeptical beforehand as the price is quite high but it is a unique and amazing feeling.

Amazing Experience. I've always wanted to experience this, Dolphin Bay is located at Atlantis, from the moment we arrived the staff were really good and kept us informed off the program, we were given information on what to expect and safety, our group consisted off ten people, once in the water area you will have two staff, one who commands the dolphin and the other who helps the group get organised, the whole experiment was wonderful, they will take pictures for you (which is costly but worth it if you have no one with you that can take the pictures for you), the experience does not last long but the ticket you buy allows you access to the water park and private beech, both great, whole day event.
Best Birthday ever. My husband booked a surprise birthday treat to swim with the dolphins , it was truly incredible and Lesa the dolphin was so perfect :)Thank you for magical swim
Unforgetable Amazing Experience. It's a place worth visiting most especially if you are with your family. A fun place to be for kids and adults alike. A must do in Dubai.
Amazing. Amazing experience you must live it. The dolphin trainers was very good and explain everythink about dolphins.

Beautiful. My wife and I have always wanted to take pictures with dolphins and we finally did it. Yes it is expensive compared to other places but if you are a bit nervous about doing things like this its the perfect place. A visit to the water park was included- home of the leap of faith!

I Agree With Everyone Else. Everything has already been said by the thousand reviews before mine. This is a wonderful experience and it is expensive. You have to decide for yourself if you can, and want, to pay for it. My wife and I have three Dolphin Bay photos and a lifetime of memories. For me, paying a few hundred dollars for that is an easy decision. And I didn't see it mentioned in any reviews I read but there is a Starbucks at Dolphin Bay, just in case that sweetens the deal for you.

Humbling Experience. Bookd before we left the UK direct with Atlantis and got a good discount which was on offer at the time. Opted for the middle experience which included swimming on the belly of the dolphin!

Dolphin encounter the best value. I did the dolphin encounter while my nephew did the royal swim. Whilst he enjoyed the royal swim with the belly ride and espes the foot push he did seem to get the same amount of 121 time with the dolphin as i did in the encounter programme. Ive also done the same programme at discovery cove in florida and cant fault either dolphin programme what is diff is for more or less the same price dis cove has much more to do ie the great reef and limits its customers. For an extra fee the sea lion discovery programme is well worth the money. We all loved the 121 time petting Sanga and getting a kiss from her and a hug. The guys taking both dolphin and sea lion programmes were excellant

Great. Had a great time with the dolphins during the dolphin adventure although it seemed like it went by so fast. Very informative and trainers are very friendly. They seem caring of the dolphins. It is a wonderful one of a lifetime experience for those who have always wanted but never been close to dolphins before. Good facilities like towels, showers, drinks available.

Great but Expensive. We have experienced Dolphin Encounter option at shallow water with our 10 months baby and it was really very good. But it was not good to charge full price for 10 months baby.Besides that, the price for 1 person was 660AED. But then we need to pay another 500AED (140USD and it was the minimum price option) to buy the pictures. I think this price was not normal!
Great experience. We had a great day out here my boys loved swimming with the dolphins n had a great time in the water with them staff were great with the kids exp the little ones

Royal Swim! Brilliant. Who isn't a big fan of dolphins? We paid for the Royal Swim and I would do it again! You have to wear a wetsuit, which might deter some people, but we had some very large people who were easily accommodated by the staff. They separated the group into 4 groups of six. There were 4 dolphins. Tina was the name of our dolphin and she was beautiful. Each person in the group got to do the following individually (professional photographer on hand)- We started with a dolphin swim. I floated in the deep and 2 dolphins came up beside me and I grabbed their fins and they pulled me to shore. Wow. We then got to hold and pat the dolphin Tina. More photos. She then kissed us on the cheek in the deep water. We swam out individually again and one by one she approached us for a kiss. Obviously, she knew that we loved her as she kissed me forever and she nibbled hubby's ear! Then hugs. We had to swim out one by one and hold arms out. Tina swam up to me and I hugged her and kissed under her face! I fell - luckily away from her because she didn't seem to want to swim away! Brilliant. Finally we went out to the trainer one by one with a bodyboard and he set up and dolphin push. Lying on the board with one leg outstretched and the other foot tucked into the knee, Tina came up behind me and her nose on my foot, she powered me through the water to the beach - wow. It was the trainee version of the push that you see in the dolphin shows. Okay, so it was expensive ($275 AU each) - but what price would you put on this experience if you could do it? It was breath taking. The trainers were brilliant and the dolphin interactions were just perfect. The only down side was the first 30 minutes were a pretty useless powerpoint in a large room with a huge group of people. Incidentally, some groups had a person with an observer pass who paid less to get the privilege to stand on the beach and take photos (but missed out on swimming with dolphins). The professional photos at the end are quite expensive and we got all of ours on a USB rather than getting hard copies as they are a bit difficult on holidays and there are so many sites online where you can order prints when you get home.

a dream come true!. this has always been one of the few things i've always wanted to do. to have a close encounter with the dolphins. trainers were great, full of humor and energy, making it a fun experience overall. dolphin was absolutely adorable, i dont regret it a single bit. only con is the price. i understand it is something unique that nobody else offers, but its overpriced, especially since you cannot take pictures or videos. so we each paid a set price for the experience and another 100 Euros extra to buy the usb with all the pictures of our group. definitely worth getting the usb especially if you are a group because you can split the amount. buying the pictures one by one is way overpriced. get them digitally and print them however you like back home, way cheaper. April weather was great for this experience.

Excellent. We visited the dolphin bay on a monday morning at 11.10am. We did the 'Dolphin Encounter'This was one of the first sessions and it was full. Initially you are in a big group but then split into 8-10 people per dolphin. In our session there were 4 dolphins. Our dolphin was called 'Central'. The interaction was amazing. You get to stroke, dance and hold the dolphin as well as kiss them. No cameras are allowed but you can purchase the pictures afterwards which are good quality and reasonably priced.The experience lasts around an hour and you get access to a free locker. Upon finishing you get a free can of fanta/coke/sprite. You can take photos afterwards on the small beach area but not in the water.It was a brilliant experience and would definitely recommend it to anyone.the staff are great too.

Wonderful Experience. Definately 'one to visit' worth every penny. My daughter said this was the highlight of our trip, she even got a kiss and a hug from Jasmine the Dolphin. Great photo souvenirs too, so hard to choose from - good price.

Amazing!. Wasn't sure about doing this but my 12 year old was keen, so we did. What an amazing experience it turned out to be for both of us. Being that close to and touching a live dolphin was something to remember. In principal I am not so sure I agree with this, however after talking to the trainers, seeing the dolphins I think it was pretty clear that they are well cared for, safe and protected and certainly gave us humans an a opportunity to appreciate these creatures up close. Husband wishes he had done it instead of watching, we will go back. By no means cheap, very expensive but hopefully it represents the cost of the care and experts involved. Ended up staying day at Atlantis water park. Too big and busy compared to Wild Wadi.

Excellent & well worth the price. We went to dolphin bay as part of our honeymoon & thought it was fantastic! Husband did the adventure package & I did the photo fun; both were great times spent with the dolphins up close & learning about them. The packages may seem expensive but remember how much you get with it & money does need to go back into the conservation of these animals so is actually worth it!
Dolphins !. great time, especially for the kids who were just mesmerized. The trainers are very good and seem to take very good care of the animals which makes you feel a little less guilty !
A well managed experience with the dolphins. Love that we can choose from different levels of encounters with the dolphins. It's a great experience to kiss, touch & hold the dolphins!

perfect. I have swam with dolphins 3 time but hands down this was the best time i have done it, i liked the way they put you in to smaller groups so could interact more with the dolphins. must done experience

Disappointing. 2 adults and 4 children. We spent a fortune here and it really was not very good. We felt like we were on a production line. My 7 year old how had paid for the interaction with her birthday money was very disappointed.
Kids enjoyed this. Not cheap but very high quality and the Dolphins looked very well looked after. I don't agree with this in principle so I only watched.

swimming dolphins: something you should have done once. although expensive, it is quite amazing to see how dolphins interact with us! beautiful creatures, smart and friendly! Fun to see they sometimes do have their own will ;-)
Fantastic!. This was definitely the highlight of my holiday! Amazing guides excellent knowledge of the dolphins i.e. their ages, origins etc… Would defiantly do it again

Fun for all. What a buzz. Well worth the admission and great to be in the water with such fantastic mammals. We were impressed by the coarse and love the staff show towards the dolphins and the way they reciprocate shows it to be a two way feeling. Amazing how strong they are when it comes to towing you back to shore. I am quite a big person but the towed me easily. This is a truly great experience for any animal lover and one that must not be missed. Suggest you stay at the Atlantis to fully enjoy not only this experience but the whole complex.

Fab. Hubby did the royal swim , was fab , lots of time spend with the dolphins on the water , very well organised , it was really emotional , had entrance to the water park for free , had fun there , be warned , no shade anywhere , take a high sun cream with you
the memory deserves the cost. Dancing , swimming with dolphins and taking pictures for you , your family and kids worth every penny you pay.

Great experience. If you love dolphins and have enough time in Dubai, pay this place a visit. Professional and informative journey, full of fun and unforgettable dolphin kisses. Spend the day in the waterpark after and complete your day with thrill and splash, trying some of the best slides in the country.

Beautiful. Once again, just had to do this! The staff were very informative and love the dolphins they care for and train. Was a great experience to interact with these beautiful, clever creatures! Enjoyed it lots. The pools are big and so clean and well kept. The dolphins seem happy and the staff really love them.
Tryst with the best of nature. A touching experience with the fine sea inhabitants who will educate you on mutual respect and finer elements of life while they entertain your kids.
So nice. It is nice place you have to visit it , I like the timing, the staff was so great, I will visit it again

Amazing Interaction. My seven year old son and myself booked in advance for this dolphin encounter and I am so glad that we did so. Professionally managed, fantastic bay, helpful staff, wonderful informative trainers, organised manner of encounter and above all the delightful dolphins. We followed each and every instruction of the trainers including the locker details, wet suits and not taking any accessory such as hair clips etc in the water for the encounter. As soon as we entered the water the dolphins begin to jump and turn in the air and wow is the word. My son was amazed and he held on to our dolphin whenever we had the chance. The dolphin swam around us, played ball with us, danced with us and of course we hugged and kissed our dolphin. I purchased the usb with all our photos as it was an encounter to cherish.

Loved it -. Me and my friends had a a wonderful time when we visited Atlantis for a Dolphin Encounter. It is an amazing day out. the staff couldn't have been more helpful. The price included access to Aquaventure, private beach and also some offers with the Lost Chambers -- highly recommended!

Excellent worth every penny. We were 3 adults and one 3 year old and paid approx 3000 dhs (£600)for the dolphin interaction in shallow waters and complimentary access to aquaventure with towels. Let me tell you it was worth every single penny. Our dolphin was called lisa who was very friendly. The dolphin interaction it self lasted approx 20 mins and the overall programme length was an hour. Before the interaction you are breifed on the do,s and donts. It was a treat for my birthday and the dolphin even sang happy birthday for son which was a nice touch.
Must have experience. Swimming with the dolphins is an experience for both children and adults, which become children again once swimming with the dolphins

A wonderful experience. My family and I had a wonderful time when we visited Atlantis for a Dolphin Encounter last week. It is an expensive day out, but definitely worth it. It was great to see the bond between the dolphins and the trainers, and the staff couldn't have been more helpful. The price included access to Aquaventure, which was also a lot of fun. I'd highly recommend a visit to Dolphin Bay when in Dubai!

Divine. I and my wife are huge fans of marine life, especially dolphins. Till recent, we hadn't had the chance to experience them up close and booked in for a shallow encounter at the Atlantis on this trip to Dubai. We apologise for forgetting our instructor's names, but they were extremely friendly and informative, particularly the Australian photographer who turned to instructing dolphins; we had a good discussion throughout the encounter regarding all aspects of dolphins and their lives at Atlantis. The spotlight of the encounter was a darling female dolphin named Inni, who was gorgeous, with a rich aura. The beautiful thing was communicating first hand with us, and exhaled via blowhole when near. While the rest of the group chose to dance with the dolphin, I took to throwing a ring, which went slightly farther than desired. She got the ring and swam back, and I managed to look at her while gently removing the ring from around her neck. We then had a kiss and hug session, which was was just divine. The other dolphin, S2, was jubilant, and when the two starting playing in the water, S2 displayed alot more moves than Inni, who seemed a bit shy. Photos....expensive!! We got the USB, which turned out the most economical. It would be good if they would allow us head mounted water proof cameras in the dolphin bay. To conclude, an excellent experience, and will return for the deep water encounter next.

Well Worth a Visit. For a once in a lifetime experience, this is hard to beat, particularly for kids. It is very pricey but it is well worth it and the whole experience is very professionally managed.

Amazing Experience!!. It was a first for our entire family, playing with Dolphins...and it was LOVELY! Our sons enjoyed every minute of our encounter and my husband and I have memories we will cherish Forever! - This is a Must Do if at all possible!
